00407

00412 void SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( INT8 bEntry )
00413 {
00414       Assert( ( bEntry >= 0 ) && ( bEntry < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) );
00415 
00416       // set this entry to selected
00417       fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ bEntry ] = TRUE ;
00418 
00419       return;
00420 }
00421 
00422 void ResetEntryForSelectedList( INT8 bEntry )
00423 {
00424       Assert( ( bEntry >= 0 ) && ( bEntry < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) );
00425 
00426       // set this entry to selected
00427       fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ bEntry ] = FALSE;
00428 
00429       return;
00430 }
00431 
00432 void ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( void )
00433 {
00434       // set all the entries int he selected list to false
00435       memset( &fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen, FALSE, MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT * sizeof( BOOLEAN ) );
00436 
00437       // if we still have a valid dude selected
00438       if ( ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) && ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE ) )
00439       {
00440             // then keep him selected
00441             SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( bSelectedInfoChar );
00442       }
00443 
00444       return;
00445 }
00446

00448 BOOLEAN IsEntryInSelectedListSet( INT8 bEntry )
00449 {
00450       Assert( ( bEntry >= 0 ) && ( bEntry < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) );
00451 
00452       // is this entry in the selected list set?
00453       
00454       return( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ bEntry ] );
00455 
00456 }

00459 void ToggleEntryInSelectedList( INT8 bEntry )
00460 {
00461       Assert( ( bEntry >= 0 ) && ( bEntry < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) );
00462 
00463       // toggle the value in the selected list
00464       fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ bEntry ] = !( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ bEntry ] );
00465 
00466       return;
00467 }
00468 
00469 void BuildSelectedListFromAToB( INT8 bA, INT8 bB )
00470 {
00471       INT8 bStart =0, bEnd = 0;
00472 
00473       // run from a to b..set slots as selected
00474 
00475       if( bA > bB )
00476       {
00477             bStart = bB;
00478             bEnd = bA;
00479       }
00480       else
00481       {
00482             bStart = bA;
00483             bEnd = bB;
00484       }
00485 
00486       // run through list and set all intermediaries to true
00487 
00488       for( bStart; bStart <= bEnd; bStart++ )
00489       {
00490             SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( bStart );
00491       }
00492 
00493       return;
00494 }
00495 
00496 
00497 BOOLEAN MultipleCharacterListEntriesSelected( void )
00498 {
00499       UINT8 ubSelectedCnt = 0;
00500       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00501 
00502       // check if more than one person is selected in the selected list
00503       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++  )
00504       {
00505             if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[iCounter] == TRUE )
00506             {
00507                   ubSelectedCnt++;
00508             }
00509       }
00510 
00511       if( ubSelectedCnt > 1 )
00512       {
00513             return( TRUE );
00514       }
00515       else
00516       {
00517             return( FALSE );
00518       }
00519 }

00522 
00523 void ResetAssignmentsForMercsTrainingUnpaidSectorsInSelectedList( INT8 bAssignment )
00524 {
00525       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00526       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00527 
00528       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00529       {
00530             // valid character?
00531             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
00532             {
00533                   // nope
00534                   continue;
00535             }
00536 
00537             pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
00538             
00539             if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
00540             {
00541                   continue;
00542             }
00543 
00544             if( pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN )
00545             {
00546                   if ( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY ) ].fMilitiaTrainingPaid == FALSE )
00547                   {
00548                         ResumeOldAssignment( pSoldier );
00549                   }
00550             }
00551       }
00552 }
00553 
00554 
00555 void ResetAssignmentOfMercsThatWereTrainingMilitiaInThisSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
00556 {
00557       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00558       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00559 
00560       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00561       {
00562             // valid character?
00563             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
00564             {
00565                   // nope
00566                   continue;
00567             }
00568 
00569             pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
00570             
00571             if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
00572             {
00573                   continue;
00574             }
00575 
00576             if( pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN )
00577             {
00578                   if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX == sSectorX ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == sSectorY ) && ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 ) )
00579                   {
00580                         ResumeOldAssignment( pSoldier );
00581                   }
00582             }
00583       }
00584 }

00604 
00605 // check if the members of the selected list move with this guy... are they in the same mvt group?
00606 void DeselectSelectedListMercsWhoCantMoveWithThisGuy( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00607 {
00608       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00609       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier2 = NULL;
00610 
00611 
00612       // deselect any other selected mercs that can't travel together with pSoldier
00613       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00614       {
00615             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
00616             {
00617                   if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
00618                   {
00619                         pSoldier2 = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
00620 
00621                         // skip the guy we are
00622                         if ( pSoldier == pSoldier2 )
00623                         {
00624                               continue;
00625                         }
00626 
00627 
00628                         // NOTE ABOUT THE VEHICLE TESTS BELOW:
00629                         // Vehicles and foot squads can't plot movement together!
00630                         // The ETAs are different, and unlike squads, vehicles can't travel everywhere!
00631                         // However, different vehicles CAN plot together, since they all travel at the same rates now
00632 
00633                         // if anchor guy is IN a vehicle
00634                         if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
00635                         {
00636                               if ( !CanSoldierMoveWithVehicleId( pSoldier2, pSoldier->iVehicleId ) )
00637                               {
00638                                     // reset entry for selected list
00639                                     ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00640                               }
00641                         }
00642                         // if anchor guy IS a vehicle
00643                         else if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00644                         {
00645                               if ( !CanSoldierMoveWithVehicleId( pSoldier2, pSoldier->bVehicleID ) )
00646                               {
00647                                     // reset entry for selected list
00648                                     ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00649                               }
00650                         }
00651                         // if this guy is IN a vehicle
00652                         else if( pSoldier2->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
00653                         {
00654                               if ( !CanSoldierMoveWithVehicleId( pSoldier, pSoldier2->iVehicleId ) )
00655                               {
00656                                     // reset entry for selected list
00657                                     ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00658                               }
00659                         }
00660                         // if this guy IS a vehicle
00661                         else if ( pSoldier2->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00662                         {
00663                               if ( !CanSoldierMoveWithVehicleId( pSoldier, pSoldier2->bVehicleID ) )
00664                               {
00665                                     // reset entry for selected list
00666                                     ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00667                               }
00668                         }
00669                         // reject those not a squad (vehicle handled above)
00670                         else if( pSoldier2->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY )
00671                         {
00672                               ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00673                         }
00674                         else
00675                         {
00676                               // reject those not in the same sector
00677                               if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX != pSoldier2->sSectorX ) ||
00678                                           ( pSoldier->sSectorY != pSoldier2->sSectorY ) ||
00679                                           ( pSoldier->bSectorZ != pSoldier2->bSectorZ ) )
00680                               {
00681                                     ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00682                               }
00683 
00684                               // if either is between sectors, they must be in the same movement group 
00685                               if ( ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors || pSoldier2->fBetweenSectors ) &&
00686                                            ( pSoldier->ubGroupID != pSoldier2->ubGroupID ) )
00687                               {
00688                                     ResetEntryForSelectedList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
00689                               }
00690                         }
00691 
00692                         // different movement groups in same sector is OK, even if they're not travelling together
00693                   }
00694             }
00695       }
00696 
00697       return;
00698 }
00699 
00700 
00701 
00702 void SelectUnselectedMercsWhoMustMoveWithThisGuy( void )
00703 {
00704       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00705       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00706 
00707 
00708       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00709       {
00710             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
00711             {
00712                   // if not already selected
00713                   if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == FALSE )
00714                   {
00715                         pSoldier = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
00716 
00717                         // if on a squad or in a vehicle
00718                         if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
00719                         {
00720                               // and a member of that squad or vehicle is selected
00721                               if ( AnyMercInSameSquadOrVehicleIsSelected( pSoldier ) )
00722                               {
00723                                     // then also select this guy
00724                                     SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( ( INT8 ) iCounter );
00725                               }
00726                         }
00727                   }
00728             }
00729       }
00730 }
00731 
00732 
00733 
00734 BOOLEAN AnyMercInSameSquadOrVehicleIsSelected( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00735 {
00736       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00737       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier2 = NULL;
00738 
00739 
00740       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00741       {
00742             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
00743             {
00744                   // if selected
00745                   if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
00746                   {
00747                         pSoldier2 = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
00748 
00749                         // if they have the same assignment
00750                         if( pSoldier->bAssignment == pSoldier2->bAssignment )
00751                         {
00752                               // same squad?
00753                               if ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
00754                               {
00755                                     return ( TRUE );
00756                               }
00757 
00758                               // same vehicle?
00759                               if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->iVehicleId == pSoldier2->iVehicleId ) )
00760                               {
00761                                     return ( TRUE );
00762                               }
00763                         }
00764 
00765                         // target guy is in a vehicle, and this guy IS that vehicle
00766                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier2->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) &&
00767                                     ( pSoldier->iVehicleId == pSoldier2->bVehicleID ) )
00768                         {
00769                               return ( TRUE );
00770                         }
00771 
00772                         // this guy is in a vehicle, and the target guy IS that vehicle
00773                         if( ( pSoldier2->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) &&
00774                                     ( pSoldier2->iVehicleId == pSoldier->bVehicleID ) )
00775                         {
00776                               return ( TRUE );
00777                         }
00778                   }
00779             }
00780       }
00781 
00782       return ( FALSE );
00783 }
00784

00786 
00787 void RestoreBackgroundForAssignmentGlowRegionList( void )
00788 {
00789       static INT32 iOldAssignmentLine = -1;
00790 
00791       // will restore the background region of the assignment list after a glow has ceased
00792       // ( a _LOST_MOUSE reason to the assignment region mvt callback handler )
00793 
00794       if( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE )
00795       {
00796             // force update
00797             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghAssignmentBox );
00798             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghEpcBox );
00799             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
00800             if( fShowSquadMenu == TRUE )
00801             {
00802                   ForceUpDateOfBox( ghSquadBox );
00803             }
00804             else if( fShowTrainingMenu == TRUE )
00805             {
00806                   ForceUpDateOfBox( ghTrainingBox );
00807             }
00808 
00809       }
00810 
00811       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster )
00812       {
00813             return;
00814       }
00815 
00816       if( iOldAssignmentLine != giAssignHighLine )
00817       {
00818             // restore background
00819             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 66, Y_START - 1, 118 + 1 - 67, ( INT16 )( ( ( MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) ) + 1 ) );
00820 
00821             // ARM: not good enough! must reblit the whole panel to erase glow chunk restored by help text disappearing!!!
00822             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00823 
00824             // set old to current
00825             iOldAssignmentLine = giAssignHighLine; 
00826       }
00827 
00828       // leave
00829       return;
00830 }

00923 void PlayGlowRegionSound( void )
00924 {
00925       // play a new message sound, if there is one playing, do nothing
00926       static UINT32 uiSoundId = 0;
00927 
00928       if( uiSoundId != 0 )
00929       {
00930             // is sound playing?..don't play new one
00931             if( SoundIsPlaying( uiSoundId ) == TRUE )
00932             { 
00933                   return;
00934             }
00935       }
00936 
00937       // otherwise no sound playing, play one
00938       uiSoundId = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Sounds\\glowclick.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN );
00939 
00940       return;
00941 }

00944 
00945 INT16 CharacterIsGettingPathPlotted( INT16 sCharNumber )
00946 {
00947       // valid character number?
00948       if( ( sCharNumber < 0 ) || ( sCharNumber >= MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) )
00949       {
00950             return( FALSE );
00951       }
00952 
00953       // is the character a valid one?
00954       if( gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
00955       {
00956             return ( FALSE );
00957       }
00958 
00959       // if the highlighted line character is also selected
00960       if ( ( ( giDestHighLine != -1 ) && IsEntryInSelectedListSet ( ( INT8 ) giDestHighLine ) ) ||
00961                    ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) && IsEntryInSelectedListSet ( bSelectedDestChar ) ) )
00962       {
00963             // then ALL selected lines will be affected
00964             if( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 ) sCharNumber ) )
00965             {
00966                   return( TRUE );
00967             }
00968       }
00969       else
00970       {
00971             // if he is *the* selected dude
00972             if( bSelectedDestChar == sCharNumber )
00973             {
00974                   return ( TRUE ); 
00975             }
00976 
00977             // ONLY the highlighted line will be affected
00978             if ( sCharNumber == giDestHighLine )
00979             {
00980                   return( TRUE );
00981             }
00982       }
00983 
00984       return ( FALSE );
00985 }
00986 
00987 BOOLEAN IsCharacterSelectedForAssignment( INT16 sCharNumber )
00988 {
00989       // valid character number?
00990       if( ( sCharNumber < 0 ) || ( sCharNumber >= MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) )
00991       {
00992             return( FALSE );
00993       }
00994 
00995       // is the character a valid one?
00996       if( gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
00997       {
00998             return ( FALSE );
00999       }
01000 
01001       // if the highlighted line character is also selected
01002       if ( ( giAssignHighLine != -1 ) && IsEntryInSelectedListSet ( ( INT8 ) giAssignHighLine ) )
01003       {
01004             // then ALL selected lines will be affected
01005             if( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 ) sCharNumber ) )
01006             {
01007                   return( TRUE );
01008             }
01009       }
01010       else
01011       {
01012             // ONLY the highlighted line will be affected
01013             if ( sCharNumber == giAssignHighLine )
01014             {
01015                   return( TRUE );
01016             }
01017       }
01018 
01019       return( FALSE );
01020 }

01173 void GoDownOneLevelInMap( void )
01174 {
01175       JumpToLevel( iCurrentMapSectorZ + 1 );
01176 }
01177

01179 void GoUpOneLevelInMap( void )
01180 {
01181       JumpToLevel( iCurrentMapSectorZ - 1 );
01182 }

01184 
01185 void JumpToLevel( INT32 iLevel )
01186 {
01187       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
01188       {
01189             // stop mapscreen text
01190             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
01191             return;
01192       }
01193 
01194       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE )
01195       {
01196             return;
01197       }
01198 
01199       // disable level-changes while in inventory pool (for keyboard equivalents!)
01200       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01201             return;
01202 
01203 
01204       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
01205       {
01206             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
01207       }
01208 
01209       if( iLevel < 0 )
01210       {
01211             iLevel = 0;
01212       }
01213 
01214       if( iLevel > MAX_DEPTH_OF_MAP )
01215       {
01216             iLevel = MAX_DEPTH_OF_MAP;
01217       }
01218 
01219       // set current sector Z to level passed
01220       ChangeSelectedMapSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )iLevel );
01221 }
01222 
01223 
01224 // check against old contract times, update as nessacary
01225 void CheckAndUpdateBasedOnContractTimes( void )
01226 {
01227       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01228       INT32 iTimeRemaining = 0;
01229 
01230       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
01231       {
01232             if( gCharactersList[iCounter].fValid == TRUE )
01233             {
01234                         // what kind of merc
01235                    if(Menptr[gCharactersList[iCounter].usSolID].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC)
01236                    { 
01237                          // amount of time left on contract
01238                          iTimeRemaining=Menptr[gCharactersList[iCounter].usSolID].iEndofContractTime-GetWorldTotalMin();
01239                          if(iTimeRemaining >60*24)
01240                          {
01241                                // more than a day, display in green
01242                                iTimeRemaining/=(60*24);
01243 
01244                                // check if real change in contract time
01245                                if( iTimeRemaining != iOldContractTimes[ iCounter ])
01246                                {
01247                                      iOldContractTimes[ iCounter ] = iTimeRemaining;
01248                                      
01249                                      // dirty screen
01250                                      fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01251                                      fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01252                                }
01253                         }
01254                         else
01255                         {
01256                               // less than a day, display hours left in red
01257                          iTimeRemaining/=60;
01258 
01259                               // check if real change in contract time
01260                               if( iTimeRemaining != iOldContractTimes[ iCounter ])
01261                               {
01262                                     iOldContractTimes[ iCounter ] = iTimeRemaining;
01263                                     // dirty screen
01264                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01265                                     fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01266                               }
01267                         }
01268                   }
01269                   else if( Menptr[gCharactersList[iCounter].usSolID].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC )
01270                   {
01271                         iTimeRemaining = Menptr[gCharactersList[iCounter].usSolID].iTotalContractLength;
01272                         
01273                         if( iTimeRemaining != iOldContractTimes[ iCounter ])
01274                         {
01275                               iOldContractTimes[ iCounter ] = iTimeRemaining;
01276                                      
01277                               // dirty screen
01278                               fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01279                               fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01280                         }
01281                   }
01282             }
01283       }
01284 }
01285 
01286 
01287 
01288 void HandleDisplayOfSelectedMercArrows( void )
01289 {
01290       INT16 sYPosition = 0;
01291       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01292       UINT8 ubCount = 0;
01293       INT16 usVehicleCount = 0;
01294 
01295       // blit an arrow by the name of each merc in a selected list
01296       if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
01297       {
01298             return;
01299       }
01300 
01301       // is the character valid?
01302       if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == FALSE )
01303       {
01304             return;
01305       }
01306 
01307       if( fShowInventoryFlag == TRUE )
01308       {
01309             return;
01310       }
01311       // now blit one by the selected merc
01312       sYPosition = Y_START+( bSelectedInfoChar * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) ) - 1;
01313       
01314       
01315       if( bSelectedInfoChar >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
01316       {
01317             // WANNE 2 <fixed>
01318             usVehicleCount = bSelectedInfoChar - FIRST_VEHICLE;
01319             sYPosition = usVehicleY+( usVehicleCount * ( Y_SIZE + 2) ) - 1;;
01320       }
01321 
01322 
01323       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiSelectedCharArrow );
01324       BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0,SELECTED_CHAR_ARROW_X, sYPosition , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01325 
01326       // now run through the selected list of guys, an arrow for each
01327       for( ubCount = 0; ubCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; ubCount++ )
01328       {
01329             if( gCharactersList[ ubCount ].fValid == TRUE )
01330             {
01331 
01332                   // are they in the selected list or int he same mvt group as this guy
01333                   if( ( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ubCount ) == TRUE ) || ( ( bSelectedDestChar != - 1 ) ? ( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ ubCount ].usSolID ].ubGroupID != 0 ) ? ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ].ubGroupID == Menptr[ gCharactersList[ ubCount ].usSolID ].ubGroupID ) : FALSE ) : FALSE ) )
01334                   {
01335                         sYPosition = Y_START+( ubCount * ( Y_SIZE + 2) ) - 1;
01336                         
01337                         if( ubCount >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
01338                         {
01339                               // WANNE 2 <fixed>
01340                               usVehicleCount = ubCount - FIRST_VEHICLE;
01341                               sYPosition = usVehicleY+( usVehicleCount * ( Y_SIZE + 2) ) - 1;;
01342                         }
01343 
01344                         GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiSelectedCharArrow );
01345                         BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0,SELECTED_CHAR_ARROW_X, sYPosition , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01346                   }
01347             }
01348       }
01349       return;
01350 }
01351 
01352 
01353 
01354 void HandleDisplayOfItemPopUpForSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sMapZ )
01355 {
01356       // handle display of item pop up for this sector
01357       // check if anyone alive in this sector
01358       ITEM_POOL         *pItemPool = NULL;
01359       static BOOLEAN fWasInited = FALSE;
01360 
01361       if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
01362       {
01363             return;
01364       }
01365       
01366       
01367       if( ( fWasInited == FALSE ) && ( fMapInventoryPoolInited ) )
01368       {
01369             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
01370             {
01371                   if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].sSectorX == sMapX ) && ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].sSectorY == sMapY ) && ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].bSectorZ == sMapZ ) && ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].bActive ) && ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
01372                   {
01373                         // valid character
01374                         InitializeItemPickupMenu( &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID] ), NOWHERE , pItemPool, MAP_INVEN_POOL_X, MAP_INVEN_POOL_Y, -1 );
01375                         fWasInited = TRUE;
01376 
01377                         CreateScreenMaskForInventoryPoolPopUp( );
01378                   }
01379             }
01380       }
01381       else if( ( fWasInited == TRUE ) && ( fMapInventoryPoolInited == FALSE ) )
01382       {
01383             fWasInited = FALSE;
01384 
01385             // now clear up the box
01386             RemoveItemPickupMenu( );
01387 
01388             // remove screen mask
01389             RemoveScreenMaskForInventoryPoolPopUp( );
01390 
01391             // drity nessacary regions
01392             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01393 
01394       }
01395 
01396       // showing it
01397       if( ( fMapInventoryPoolInited ) && ( fWasInited ) )
01398       {
01399             SetPickUpMenuDirtyLevel( DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01400             RenderItemPickupMenu( );
01401       }
01402 
01403 
01404       return;
01405 }
01406 
01407

01413                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, InventoryScreenMaskBtnCallback ); 
01414 
01415 }

01418 {

01420       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gInventoryScreenMask );
01421 }

01426 {

01429   {
01430         fMapInventoryPoolInited = FALSE;
01431   }

01433 
01434 void GetMoraleString( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, STR16 sString )
01435 {
01436       INT8 bMorale = pSoldier->bMorale;
01437 
01438       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
01439       {
01440     wcscpy( sString, pMoralStrings[ 5 ] );
01441       }
01442       else if( bMorale > 80 )
01443       {
01444             wcscpy( sString, pMoralStrings[ 0 ] );
01445       }
01446       else if( bMorale > 65 )
01447       {
01448     wcscpy( sString, pMoralStrings[ 1 ] );
01449       }
01450       else if( bMorale > 35 )
01451       {
01452     wcscpy( sString, pMoralStrings[ 2 ] );
01453       }
01454       else if( bMorale > 20 )
01455       {
01456             wcscpy( sString, pMoralStrings[ 3 ] );
01457       }
01458       else
01459       {
01460     wcscpy( sString, pMoralStrings[ 4 ] );
01461       }
01462 }

01465 
01466 // NOTE: This doesn't use the "LeaveList" system at all!
01467 void HandleLeavingOfEquipmentInCurrentSector( UINT32 uiMercId )
01468 {
01469       // just drop the stuff in the current sector
01470       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01471   INT16 sGridNo, sTempGridNo;
01472 
01473       if( Menptr[ uiMercId ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX || Menptr[ uiMercId ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY || Menptr[ uiMercId ].bSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ )
01474       {
01475     // ATE: Use insertion gridno if not nowhere and insertion is gridno
01476    if ( Menptr[ uiMercId ].ubStrategicInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO && Menptr[ uiMercId ].usStrategicInsertionData != NOWHERE )
01477    {
01478               sGridNo = Menptr[ uiMercId ].usStrategicInsertionData;
01479    }
01480    else
01481    {
01482       // Set flag for item...
01483       sGridNo = RandomGridNo();
01484    }
01485       }
01486   else
01487   {
01488     // ATE: Mercs can have a gridno of NOWHERE.....
01489     sGridNo = Menptr[ uiMercId ].sGridNo;
01490 
01491     if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01492     {
01493       sGridNo = RandomGridNo();
01494 
01495                   sTempGridNo = FindNearestAvailableGridNoForItem( sGridNo, 5 );
01496                   if( sTempGridNo == NOWHERE )
01497                         sTempGridNo = FindNearestAvailableGridNoForItem( sGridNo, 15 );
01498 
01499       if ( sTempGridNo != NOWHERE )
01500       {
01501         sGridNo = sTempGridNo;
01502       }
01503     }
01504   }
01505 
01506       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_INV_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
01507       {
01508             // slot found,          
01509             // check if actual item
01510             if(  Menptr[ uiMercId ].inv[ iCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
01511             {
01512           if( Menptr[ uiMercId ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX || Menptr[ uiMercId ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY || Menptr[ uiMercId ].bSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ )
01513           {
01514         // Set flag for item...
01515                         AddItemsToUnLoadedSector( Menptr[ uiMercId ].sSectorX,  Menptr[ uiMercId ].sSectorY, Menptr[ uiMercId ].bSectorZ , sGridNo, 1, &( Menptr[ uiMercId ].inv[ iCounter ]) , Menptr[ uiMercId ].bLevel, WOLRD_ITEM_FIND_SWEETSPOT_FROM_GRIDNO | WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE, 0, 1, FALSE );
01516       }
01517                   else
01518                   {
01519                         AddItemToPool( sGridNo, &( Menptr[ uiMercId ].inv[ iCounter ] ) , 1, Menptr[ uiMercId ].bLevel, WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE, 0 );
01520                   }
01521             }
01522       }
01523 
01524   DropKeysInKeyRing( MercPtrs[ uiMercId ], sGridNo, MercPtrs[ uiMercId ]->bLevel, 1, FALSE, 0, FALSE );
01525 
01526 }
01527 
01528 
01529 
01530 void HandleMercLeavingEquipmentInOmerta( UINT32 uiMercId )
01531 {
01532       INT32 iSlotIndex = 0;
01533 
01534       // stash the items into a linked list hanging of a free "leave item list" slot
01535       if( ( iSlotIndex = SetUpDropItemListForMerc( uiMercId ) ) != -1 )
01536       {
01537             // post event to drop it there 6 hours later
01538             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_MERC_LEAVE_EQUIP_IN_OMERTA, GetWorldTotalMin() + ( 6 * 60 ), iSlotIndex );
01539       }
01540       else
01541       {
01542             // otherwise there's no free slots left (shouldn't ever happen)
01543             AssertMsg( FALSE, "HandleMercLeavingEquipmentInOmerta: No more free slots, equipment lost" );
01544       }
01545 }
01546

01551 
01552       // stash the items into a linked list hanging of a free "leave item list" slot
01553       if( ( iSlotIndex = SetUpDropItemListForMerc( uiMercId ) ) != -1 )

01557       }
01558       else
01559       {
01560             // otherwise there's no free slots left (shouldn't ever happen)

01562       }
01563 }
01564 
01565 
01566 void HandleEquipmentLeftInOmerta( UINT32 uiSlotIndex )
01567 {
01568       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pItem;
01569       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
01570 
01571 
01572       Assert( uiSlotIndex < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS );
01573 
01574       pItem = gpLeaveListHead[ uiSlotIndex ];
01575 
01576       if( pItem )
01577       {
01578             if ( guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ uiSlotIndex ] != NO_PROFILE )
01579             {
01580                   swprintf( sString, pLeftEquipmentString[ 0 ], gMercProfiles[ guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ uiSlotIndex ] ].zNickname );
01581                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, sString);
01582             }
01583             else
01584             {
01585                   swprintf( sString, L"A departing merc has left their equipment in Omerta." );
01586                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, sString);
01587             }
01588       }
01589 
01590       while( pItem )
01591       {
01592             if( gWorldSectorX  != OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_SECTOR_X || gWorldSectorY != OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_SECTOR_Y || gbWorldSectorZ != OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_SECTOR_Z )
01593             {
01594                   // given this slot value, add to sector item list
01595                   AddItemsToUnLoadedSector( OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_SECTOR_X, OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_SECTOR_Y, OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_SECTOR_Z, OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_GRIDNO, 1, &( pItem -> o ) , 0, WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE, 0, 1, FALSE );
01596             }
01597             else
01598             {
01599                   AddItemToPool( OMERTA_LEAVE_EQUIP_GRIDNO, &( pItem->o ), 1, 0, WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE, 0 );
01600             }
01601             pItem = pItem -> pNext;
01602       }
01603 
01604       FreeLeaveListSlot( uiSlotIndex );
01605 }
01606 
01607 
01608 
01609 void HandleEquipmentLeftInDrassen( UINT32 uiSlotIndex )
01610 {
01611       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pItem;
01612       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
01613 
01614 
01615       Assert( uiSlotIndex < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS );
01616 
01617       pItem = gpLeaveListHead[ uiSlotIndex ];
01618 
01619       if( pItem )
01620       {
01621             if ( guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ uiSlotIndex ] != NO_PROFILE )

01623                   swprintf( sString, pLeftEquipmentString[ 1 ], gMercProfiles[ guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ uiSlotIndex ] ].zNickname );
01624                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, sString);
01625             }
01626             else
01627             {
01628                   swprintf( sString, L"A departing merc has left their equipment in Drassen." );
01629                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, sString);
01630             }
01631       }
01632

01634       {
01635             if( gWorldSectorX  != BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_X || gWorldSectorY != BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Y || gbWorldSectorZ != BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Z )

01639             }

01642                   AddItemToPool( 10433, &( pItem->o ), 1, 0, WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE, 0 );
01643             }
01644             pItem = pItem->pNext;
01645       }
01646 
01647       FreeLeaveListSlot( uiSlotIndex );
01648 }

01650 
01651 void InitLeaveList( void )
01652 {
01653       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01654 
01655       // init leave list with NULLS/zeroes
01656       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
01657       {
01658             gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] = NULL;
01659             guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ iCounter ] = NO_PROFILE;
01660       }
01661 }
01662 
01663 
01664 void ShutDownLeaveList( void )
01665 {
01666       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01667 
01668       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
01669       {
01670             // go through nodes and free them
01671             if ( gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] != NULL )
01672             {
01673                   FreeLeaveListSlot( iCounter );
01674             }
01675       }
01676 }
01677 
01678 
01679 BOOLEAN AddItemToLeaveIndex( OBJECTTYPE *o, UINT32 uiSlotIndex )
01680 {
01681       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pItem, *pCurrentItem;
01682 
01683       Assert( uiSlotIndex < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS );
01684 
01685 
01686       if( o == NULL )
01687       {
01688             return( FALSE );
01689       }
01690 
01691       // allocate space
01692       pItem = (MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) );
01693 
01694       // copy object
01695       memcpy( &( pItem->o ), o, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01696       
01697       // nobody afterwards
01698       pItem->pNext = NULL;
01699 
01700       // now add to list in this index slot
01701       pCurrentItem = gpLeaveListHead[ uiSlotIndex ];
01702 
01703       if( pCurrentItem == NULL )
01704       {
01705             gpLeaveListHead[ uiSlotIndex ] = pItem;
01706             return( TRUE );
01707       }
01708 
01709       // move through list
01710       while( pCurrentItem ->pNext )
01711       {
01712              pCurrentItem = pCurrentItem->pNext;
01713       }
01714 
01715       // found
01716       pCurrentItem->pNext = pItem;
01717 
01718       return( TRUE );
01719 }
01720 
01721 
01722 // release memory for all items in this slot's leave item list
01723 void FreeLeaveListSlot( UINT32 uiSlotIndex )
01724 {
01725       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pCurrent = NULL, *pTemp = NULL;
01726 
01727       Assert( uiSlotIndex < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS );
01728 
01729       pCurrent = gpLeaveListHead[ uiSlotIndex ];
01730 
01731       // go through nodes and free them
01732       while( pCurrent )
01733       {
01734             pTemp = pCurrent->pNext;
01735             MemFree( pCurrent );
01736             pCurrent = pTemp;
01737       }
01738 
01739       gpLeaveListHead[ uiSlotIndex ] = NULL;
01740 }
01741 
01742 
01743 
01744 INT32 FindFreeSlotInLeaveList( void )
01745 {
01746       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01747 
01748       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
01749       {
01750             if( gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] == NULL )
01751             {
01752                   return( iCounter );
01753             }
01754       }
01755 
01756       return( -1 );
01757 }
01758 
01759 
01760 INT32 SetUpDropItemListForMerc( UINT32 uiMercId )
01761 {
01762       // will set up a drop list for this grunt, remove items from inventory, and profile
01763       INT32 iSlotIndex = -1;
01764       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01765 
01766       iSlotIndex = FindFreeSlotInLeaveList( );
01767       if( iSlotIndex == -1 )
01768       {
01769             return( -1 );
01770       }
01771 
01772       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_INV_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
01773       {
01774             // slot found,
01775             // check if actual item
01776             if(  Menptr[ uiMercId ].inv[ iCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
01777             {
01778                   // make a linked list of the items left behind, with the ptr to its head in this free slot
01779                   AddItemToLeaveIndex( &( Menptr[ uiMercId ].inv[ iCounter ] ), iSlotIndex );
01780 
01781                   // store owner's profile id for the items added to this leave slot index
01782                   SetUpMercAboutToLeaveEquipment( Menptr[ uiMercId ].ubProfile, iSlotIndex );
01783             }
01784       }
01785 
01786   // ATE: Added this to drop keyring keys - the 2nd last paramter says to add it to a leave list...
01787   // the gridno, level and visiblity are ignored
01788   DropKeysInKeyRing( MercPtrs[ uiMercId ], NOWHERE, 0, 0, TRUE, iSlotIndex, FALSE );
01789 
01790       // zero out profiles
01791       memset( ( gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ uiMercId ].ubProfile ].bInvStatus ), 0, sizeof( UINT8 ) * 19 );
01792       memset( ( gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ uiMercId ].ubProfile ].bInvNumber ), 0, sizeof( UINT8 ) * 19 );
01793       memset( ( gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ uiMercId ].ubProfile ].inv ), 0, sizeof( UINT16 ) * 19 );
01794 
01795       return( iSlotIndex );
01796 }
01797 
01798 
01799 // store owner's profile id for the items added to this leave slot index
01800 void SetUpMercAboutToLeaveEquipment( UINT32 ubProfileId, UINT32 uiSlotIndex )
01801 {
01802       Assert( uiSlotIndex < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS );
01803 
01804       // store the profile ID of this merc in the same slot that the items are gonna be dropped in
01805       guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ uiSlotIndex ] = ubProfileId;
01806 
01807 }

01994 
01995 void UpdateCharRegionHelpText( void )
01996 {
01997       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
01998       CHAR16 pMoraleStr[ 128 ];
01999       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
02000 
02001 
02002       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) && ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE ) )
02003       {
02004             // valid soldier selected
02005             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
02006 
02007             // health/energy/morale
02008             if( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
02009             {
02010                   if ( pSoldier->bLife != 0 )
02011                   {
02012                         if ( AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] ) )
02013                         {
02014                               // robot (condition only)
02015                               swprintf( sString, L"%s: %d/%d",
02016                                                                               pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 3 ], pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax );
02017                         }
02018                         else if ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02019                         {
02020                               // vehicle (condition/fuel)
02021                               swprintf( sString, L"%s: %d/%d, %s: %d/%d",
02022                                                                               pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 3 ], pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax,
02023                                                                               pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 4 ], pSoldier->bBreath, pSoldier->bBreathMax );
02024                         }
02025                         else
02026                         {
02027                               // person (health/energy/morale)
02028                               GetMoraleString( pSoldier, pMoraleStr );
02029                               swprintf( sString, L"%s: %d/%d, %s: %d/%d, %s: %s",
02030                                                                               pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 0 ], pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax,
02031                                                                               pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 1 ], pSoldier->bBreath, pSoldier->bBreathMax,
02032                                                                               pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 2 ], pMoraleStr );
02033                         }
02034                   }
02035                   else
02036                   {
02037                         wcscpy( sString, L"" );
02038                   }
02039             }
02040             else
02041             {
02042                   // POW - stats unknown
02043                   swprintf( sString, L"%s: ??, %s: ??, %s: ??", pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 0 ], pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 1 ], pMapScreenStatusStrings[ 2 ] );
02044             }
02045 
02046             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gMapStatusBarsRegion, sString );
02047 
02048 
02049             // update CONTRACT button help text
02050             if ( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( bSelectedInfoChar ) )
02051             {
02052                   SetButtonFastHelpText( giMapContractButton, pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 3 ] );
02053                   EnableButton( giMapContractButton );
02054             }
02055             else
02056             {
02057                   SetButtonFastHelpText( giMapContractButton, L"" );
02058                   DisableButton( giMapContractButton );
02059             }
02060 
02061 
02062             if ( CanToggleSelectedCharInventory( ) )
02063             {
02064                   // inventory
02065                   if( fShowInventoryFlag )
02066                   {
02067                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
02068                   }
02069                   else
02070                   {
02071                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
02072                   }
02073             }
02074             else  // can't toggle it, don't show any inventory help text
02075             {
02076                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, L"" );
02077             }
02078       }
02079       else
02080       {
02081             // invalid soldier
02082             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gMapStatusBarsRegion), L"" );
02083             SetButtonFastHelpText( giMapContractButton, L"" );
02084             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, L"" );
02085             DisableButton( giMapContractButton );
02086       }
02087 }
02088 
02089 
02090 // find this merc in the mapscreen list and set as selected
02091 void FindAndSetThisContractSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02092 {
02093       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02094 
02095       fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
02096       
02097       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ ) 
02098       {
02099             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter].fValid == TRUE )
02100             {
02101                   if( gCharactersList[ iCounter].usSolID == pSoldier->ubID )
02102                   {
02103                         ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 )iCounter, TRUE );
02104                         bSelectedContractChar = ( INT8 )iCounter;
02105                         fShowContractMenu = TRUE; 
02106                         
02107                         // create
02108                         RebuildContractBoxForMerc( pSoldier );
02109 
02110                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
02111                         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
02112                   }
02113             }
02114       }
02115 }

02130 
02131 void UpdateMapScreenAssignmentPositions( void )
02132 {
02133       // set the position of the pop up boxes
02134       SGPPoint pPoint;
02135       
02136 
02137       if( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
02138       {
02139             return;
02140       }
02141 
02142 
02143       if( bSelectedAssignChar == -1 )
02144       {
02145             if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == FALSE )
02146             {
02147                   giBoxY = 0;
02148             }
02149             return;
02150       }
02151 
02152       if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedAssignChar ].fValid == FALSE )
02153       {
02154             if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == FALSE )
02155             {
02156                   giBoxY = 0;
02157             }
02158             return;
02159       }
02160 
02161       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
02162       {
02163             // do nothing
02164       }
02165       else
02166       {
02167             giBoxY = ( Y_START + ( bSelectedAssignChar ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) );
02168 
02169 /* ARM: Removed this - refreshes fine without it, apparently
02170             // make sure the menus don't overlap the map screen bottom panel (but where did 102 come from?)
02171             if( giBoxY >= ( MAP_BOTTOM_Y - 102 ) )
02172                   giBoxY = MAP_BOTTOM_Y - 102;
02173 */
02174       }
02175 
02176       
02177             
02178       AssignmentPosition.iY = giBoxY;
02179 
02180       AttributePosition.iY = TrainPosition.iY = AssignmentPosition.iY + ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 )* ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN;
02181 
02182       VehiclePosition.iY = AssignmentPosition.iY + ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_VEHICLE;
02183       SquadPosition.iY = AssignmentPosition.iY;
02184 
02185       if( fShowAssignmentMenu )
02186       {
02187             GetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, &pPoint);
02188             pPoint.iY = giBoxY;
02189 
02190             SetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, pPoint );
02191 
02192             GetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, &pPoint);
02193             pPoint.iY = giBoxY;
02194 
02195             SetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, pPoint );
02196       }
02197 
02198       if( fShowAttributeMenu )
02199       {
02200             GetBoxPosition( ghAttributeBox, &pPoint);
02201 
02202             pPoint.iY = giBoxY + ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN;
02203 
02204             SetBoxPosition( ghAttributeBox, pPoint );
02205       }
02206 
02207       if( fShowRepairMenu )
02208       {
02209             GetBoxPosition( ghRepairBox, &pPoint);
02210             pPoint.iY = giBoxY + ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR;
02211 
02212             SetBoxPosition( ghRepairBox, pPoint );
02213       }
02214 
02215 
02216       
02217       return;
02218 }

02279 
02280 
02281 void RandomMercInGroupSaysQuote( GROUP *pGroup, UINT16 usQuoteNum )
02282 {
02283       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
02284       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02285       UINT8                   ubMercsInGroup[ 20 ];
02286       UINT8                   ubNumMercs = 0;
02287       UINT8                   ubChosenMerc;
02288 
02289 
02290       // if traversing tactically, don't do this, unless time compression was required for some reason (don't go to sector)
02291       if ( ( gfTacticalTraversal || ( pGroup->ubSectorZ > 0 ) ) && !IsTimeBeingCompressed() )
02292       {
02293             return;
02294       }
02295 
02296 
02297       // Let's choose somebody in group.....
02298       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02299 
02300       while( pPlayer != NULL )
02301       {
02302             pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
02303             Assert( pSoldier );
02304 
02305             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) &&
02306                               !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
02307             {
02308                   ubMercsInGroup[ ubNumMercs ] = pSoldier->ubID;
02309                   ubNumMercs++;
02310             }
02311 
02312             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02313       }
02314 
02315       // At least say quote....
02316       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
02317       {
02318             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
02319             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubMercsInGroup[ ubChosenMerc ] ];
02320 
02321             TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, usQuoteNum );
02322       }
02323 }
02324 
02325 
02326 INT32 GetNumberOfPeopleInCharacterList( void )
02327 {
02328       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
02329 
02330       // get the number of valid mercs in the mapscreen character list
02331       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
02332       {
02333             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter].fValid == TRUE )
02334             {
02335                   // another valid character
02336                   iCount++;
02337             }
02338       }
02339 
02340       return( iCount );
02341 }
02342 
02343 
02344 
02345 BOOLEAN ValidSelectableCharForNextOrPrev( INT32 iNewCharSlot )
02346 {
02347       BOOLEAN fHoldingItem = FALSE;
02348 
02349       // if holding an item
02350       if ( ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) || gpItemPointer || fMapInventoryItem )
02351       {
02352             fHoldingItem = TRUE;
02353       }
02354 
02355 
02356       // if showing merc inventory, or holding an item
02357       if ( fShowInventoryFlag || fHoldingItem )
02358       {
02359             // the new guy must have accessible inventory
02360             if ( !MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( ( INT8 ) iNewCharSlot ) )
02361             {
02362                   return( FALSE );
02363             }
02364       }
02365 
02366 
02367       if ( fHoldingItem )
02368       {
02369             return ( MapscreenCanPassItemToCharNum( iNewCharSlot ) );
02370       }
02371       else
02372       {
02373             return( TRUE );
02374       }
02375 }
02376 
02377 
02378 
02379 BOOLEAN MapscreenCanPassItemToCharNum( INT32 iNewCharSlot )
02380 {
02381       SOLDIERTYPE *pNewSoldier;
02382       SOLDIERTYPE *pOldSoldier;
02383 
02384 
02385       // assumes we're holding an item
02386       Assert( ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) || gpItemPointer || fMapInventoryItem );
02387 
02388 
02389       // if in a hostile sector, disallow
02390       if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
02391       {
02392             return( FALSE );
02393       }
02394 
02395       // can't pass items to nobody!
02396       if ( iNewCharSlot == -1 )
02397       {
02398             return( FALSE );
02399       }
02400 
02401 
02402       pNewSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iNewCharSlot ].usSolID ];
02403 
02404 
02405       // if showing sector inventory, and the item came from there
02406       if ( fShowMapInventoryPool && !gpItemPointerSoldier && fMapInventoryItem )
02407       {
02408             // disallow passing items to anyone not in that sector
02409             if ( pNewSoldier->sSectorX != sSelMapX ||
02410                          pNewSoldier->sSectorY != sSelMapY ||
02411                          pNewSoldier->bSectorZ != ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
02412             {
02413                   return( FALSE );
02414             }
02415 
02416             if ( pNewSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
02417             {
02418                   return( FALSE );
02419             }
02420       }
02421 
02422 
02423       // if we know who it came from
02424       if ( gpItemPointerSoldier )
02425       {
02426             pOldSoldier = gpItemPointerSoldier;
02427       }
02428       else
02429       {
02430             // it came from either the currently selected merc, or the sector inventory
02431             if ( fMapInventoryItem || ( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 ) )
02432             {
02433                   pOldSoldier = NULL;
02434             }
02435             else
02436             {
02437                   pOldSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
02438             }
02439       }
02440 
02441 
02442       // if another merc had it previously
02443       if ( pOldSoldier != NULL )
02444       {
02445             // disallow passing items to a merc not in the same sector
02446             if ( pNewSoldier->sSectorX != pOldSoldier->sSectorX ||
02447                          pNewSoldier->sSectorY != pOldSoldier->sSectorY ||
02448                          pNewSoldier->bSectorZ != pOldSoldier->bSectorZ )
02449             {
02450                   return( FALSE );
02451             }
02452 
02453             // if on the road
02454             if ( pNewSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
02455             {
02456                   // other guy must also be on the road...
02457                   if ( !pOldSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
02458                   {
02459                         return( FALSE );
02460                   }
02461 
02462                   // only exchanges between those is the same squad or vehicle are permitted
02463                   if ( pNewSoldier->bAssignment != pOldSoldier->bAssignment )
02464                   {
02465                         return( FALSE );
02466                   }
02467 
02468                   // if in vehicles, make sure it's the same one
02469                   if ( ( pNewSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pNewSoldier->iVehicleId != pOldSoldier->iVehicleId ) )
02470                   {
02471                         return( FALSE );
02472                   }
02473             }
02474       }
02475 
02476 
02477       // passed all tests
02478       return( TRUE );
02479 }
02480 
02481 
02482 
02483 void GoToNextCharacterInList( void )
02484 {
02485       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
02486 
02487 
02488       if( fShowDescriptionFlag == TRUE )
02489       {
02490             return;
02491       }
02492 
02493       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
02494       {
02495             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
02496       }
02497 
02498       // is the current guy invalid or the first one?
02499       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )|| ( bSelectedInfoChar == MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) )
02500       {
02501             iCount = 0;
02502       }
02503       else
02504       {
02505             iCount = bSelectedInfoChar + 1;
02506       }
02507 
02508       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
02509       {
02510             if ( ( gCharactersList[ iCount ].fValid ) && ( iCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) && ValidSelectableCharForNextOrPrev( iCount ) )
02511             {
02512                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 )iCount, TRUE );
02513                   break;
02514             }
02515             else
02516             {
02517                   iCount++;
02518 
02519                   if( iCount >= MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT )
02520                   {
02521                         iCount = 0;
02522                   }
02523             }
02524       }
02525 }
02526 
02527 
02528 void GoToPrevCharacterInList( void )
02529 {
02530       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
02531 
02532 
02533       if( fShowDescriptionFlag == TRUE )
02534       {
02535             return;
02536       }
02537 
02538       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
02539       {
02540             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
02541       }
02542 
02543       // is the current guy invalid or the first one?
02544       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 ) || ( bSelectedInfoChar == 0 ) )
02545       {
02546             iCount = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT;
02547       }
02548       else
02549       {
02550             iCount = bSelectedInfoChar - 1;
02551       }
02552 
02553       // now run through the list and find first prev guy
02554       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
02555       {
02556             if ( ( gCharactersList[ iCount ].fValid ) && ( iCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) && ValidSelectableCharForNextOrPrev( iCount ) )
02557             {
02558                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 )iCount, TRUE );
02559                   break;
02560             }
02561             else
02562             {
02563                   iCount--;
02564 
02565                   if( iCount < 0 )
02566                   {
02567                         // was FIRST_VEHICLE
02568                         iCount = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT;
02569                   }
02570             }
02571       }
02572 }
02573 
02574 
02575 
02576 void HandleMinerEvent( UINT8 bMinerNumber, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sQuoteNumber, BOOLEAN fForceMapscreen )
02577 {
02578       BOOLEAN fFromMapscreen = FALSE;
02579 
02580 
02581       if ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02582       {
02583             fFromMapscreen = TRUE;
02584       }
02585       else
02586       {
02587             // if transition to mapscreen is required
02588             if ( fForceMapscreen )
02589             {
02590                   // switch to mapscreen so we can flash the mine sector the guy is talking about
02591                   EnterMapScreen( );
02592                   fFromMapscreen = TRUE;
02593             }
02594       }
02595 
02596       if ( fFromMapscreen )
02597       {
02598             // if not showing map surface level
02599             if ( iCurrentMapSectorZ != 0 )
02600             {
02601                   // switch to it, because the miner locators wouldn't show up if we're underground while they speak
02602                   ChangeSelectedMapSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, 0 );
02603             }
02604 
02605             // set up the mine sector flasher
02606             gsSectorLocatorX = sSectorX;
02607             gsSectorLocatorY = sSectorY;
02608 
02609             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
02610 
02611             // post dialogue events for miners to say this quote and flash the sector where his mine is
02612             CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( ( UINT8 )uiExternalFaceProfileIds[ bMinerNumber ], sQuoteNumber,   bMinerNumber , DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , FALSE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_MINESECTOREVENT, START_RED_SECTOR_LOCATOR, 1 );
02613             CharacterDialogue( ( UINT8 )uiExternalFaceProfileIds[ bMinerNumber ], sQuoteNumber, ( UINT8 )( UINT8 )uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ bMinerNumber ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI,  FALSE , FALSE );
02614             CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( ( UINT8 )uiExternalFaceProfileIds[ bMinerNumber ], sQuoteNumber,   bMinerNumber , DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , FALSE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_MINESECTOREVENT, STOP_RED_SECTOR_LOCATOR, 1 );
02615       }
02616       else  // stay in tactical
02617       {
02618             // no need to to highlight mine sector
02619             CharacterDialogue( ( UINT8 )uiExternalFaceProfileIds[ bMinerNumber ], sQuoteNumber, ( UINT8 )( UINT8 )uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ bMinerNumber ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI,  FALSE , FALSE );
02620       }
02621 }
02622 
02623 
02624 void SetUpAnimationOfMineSectors( INT32 iEvent )
02625 {
02626       // set up the animation of mine sectors
02627       switch( iEvent )
02628       {
02629             case START_RED_SECTOR_LOCATOR:
02630                   gubBlitSectorLocatorCode = LOCATOR_COLOR_RED;
02631                   break;
02632 
02633             case START_YELLOW_SECTOR_LOCATOR:
02634                   gubBlitSectorLocatorCode = LOCATOR_COLOR_YELLOW;
02635                   break;
02636 
02637             case STOP_RED_SECTOR_LOCATOR:
02638             case STOP_YELLOW_SECTOR_LOCATOR:
02639                   TurnOffSectorLocator();
02640                   break;
02641       }
02642 }
02643 
02644 void ShutDownUserDefineHelpTextRegions( void )
02645 {
02646       // dirty the tactical panel
02647       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02648       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
02649 
02650       //dirty the map panel
02651       StopMapScreenHelpText( );
02652 
02653       //r eset tactical flag too
02654       StopShowingInterfaceFastHelpText( );
02655 }
02656 
02657 
02658 // thsi will setup the fast help text regions that are unrelated to mouse regions
02659 // user is to pass in the x,y position of the box, the width to wrap the strings and the string itself
02660 BOOLEAN SetUpFastHelpListRegions( INT32 iXPosition[], INT32 iYPosition[], INT32 iWidth[], STR16 sString[], INT32 iSize )
02661 {
02662       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02663 
02664       // reset the size
02665       giSizeOfInterfaceFastHelpTextList = 0;
02666 
02667       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSize; iCounter++ )
02668       {
02669 
02670             // forgiving way of making sure we don't go too far
02671             CHECKF( iCounter < MAX_MAPSCREEN_FAST_HELP );
02672 
02673             // now copy over info
02674             pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].iX = iXPosition[ iCounter ];
02675             pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].iY = iYPosition[ iCounter ];
02676             pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].iW = iWidth[ iCounter ];
02677 
02678             // copy string
02679             wcscpy( pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].FastHelpText, sString[ iCounter ] );
02680 
02681             // update the size
02682             giSizeOfInterfaceFastHelpTextList = iCounter + 1;
02683       }
02684 
02685       return( TRUE );
02686 }
02687 
02688 
02689 // handle the actual showing of the interface fast help text
02690 void HandleShowingOfTacticalInterfaceFastHelpText( void )
02691 {
02692       static BOOLEAN fTextActive = FALSE;
02693 
02694       if( fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive )
02695       {
02696             DisplayFastHelpRegions( pFastHelpMapScreenList, giSizeOfInterfaceFastHelpTextList );
02697 
02698             PauseGame();
02699 
02700             // lock out the screen
02701             SetUpShutDownMapScreenHelpTextScreenMask( );
02702 
02703             gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
02704 
02705             // the text is active
02706             fTextActive = TRUE;
02707 
02708       }
02709       else if( ( fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive == FALSE ) && ( fTextActive ) ) 
02710       {
02711             fTextActive = FALSE;
02712             UnPauseGame();
02713             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
02714 
02715             // shut down
02716             ShutDownUserDefineHelpTextRegions( );
02717       }
02718 
02719       return;
02720 }
02721 
02722 // start showing fast help text
02723 void StartShowingInterfaceFastHelpText( void )
02724 {
02725       fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive = TRUE;
02726 }
02727 
02728 // stop showing interface fast help text
02729 void StopShowingInterfaceFastHelpText( void )
02730 {     
02731       fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive = FALSE;
02732 }
02733 
02734 
02735 // is the interface text up?
02736 BOOLEAN IsTheInterfaceFastHelpTextActive( void )
02737 {
02738       return( fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive );
02739 }
02740 
02741 
02742 // display all the regions in the list
02743 void DisplayFastHelpRegions( FASTHELPREGION *pRegion, INT32 iSize )
02744 {
02745       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02746 
02747       // run through and show all the regions
02748       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSize; iCounter++ )
02749       {
02750             DisplayUserDefineHelpTextRegions( &( pRegion[ iCounter ] ) );
02751       }
02752 
02753       return;
02754 }
02755 
02756 // show one region
02757 void DisplayUserDefineHelpTextRegions( FASTHELPREGION *pRegion )
02758 {
02759       UINT16 usFillColor;
02760       INT32 iX,iY,iW,iH;
02761       INT32 iNumberOfLines = 1;
02762       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
02763       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02764 
02765 
02766       // grab the color for the background region
02767       usFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 240, 188));
02768       
02769 
02770       iX = pRegion->iX;
02771       iY = pRegion->iY;
02772       // get the width and height of the string
02773       iW = (INT32)( pRegion->iW ) + 14;
02774       iH = IanWrappedStringHeight( ( UINT16 )iX, ( UINT16 )iY, ( UINT16 )( pRegion->iW ), 0, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_BLACK, pRegion->FastHelpText, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, 0 );
02775 
02776       // tack on the outer border
02777       iH += 14;
02778 
02779       // gone not far enough?
02780       if ( iX < 0 )
02781             iX = 0;
02782 
02783       // gone too far
02784       if ( ( pRegion->iX + iW ) >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
02785             iX = (SCREEN_WIDTH - iW - 4);
02786 
02787       // what about the y value?
02788       iY = (INT32)pRegion->iY - (  iH * 3 / 4);
02789 
02790       // not far enough
02791       if (iY < 0)
02792             iY = 0;
02793 
02794       // too far
02795       if ( (iY + iH) >= SCREEN_HEIGHT )
02796             iY = (SCREEN_HEIGHT - iH - 15);
02797 
02798       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
02799       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
02800       RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX + 1, iY + 1, iX + iW - 1, iY + iH - 1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 57, 15 ) ), pDestBuf );
02801       RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX, iY, iX + iW - 2, iY + iH - 2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 227, 198, 88 ) ), pDestBuf );
02802       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02803       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
02804       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
02805 
02806       // fillt he video surface areas
02807       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, iX, iY, (iX + iW), (iY + iH), 0);
02808       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, (iX + 1), (iY + 1), (iX + iW - 1), (iY + iH - 1), usFillColor);
02809 
02810       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
02811       SetFontForeground( FONT_BEIGE );
02812 
02813       iH = ( INT32 )DisplayWrappedString( ( INT16 )( iX + 10 ), ( INT16 )( iY + 6 ), ( INT16 )pRegion->iW, 0, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_BEIGE, pRegion->FastHelpText, FONT_NEARBLACK, TRUE, 0 );
02814 
02815       iHeightOfInitFastHelpText = iH + 20;
02816 
02817       InvalidateRegion(  iX, iY, (iX + iW) , (iY + iH + 20 ) );
02818 
02819 }
02820

02824 extern void DisplayHelpTokenizedString( STR16 pStringA, INT16 sX, INT16 sY );
02825 extern INT16 GetNumberOfLinesInHeight( STR16 pStringA );
02826 extern INT16 GetWidthOfString( STR16 pStringA );

02828 void DisplaySoldierToolTip( FASTHELPREGION *pRegion )
02829 {
02830       UINT16 usFillColor;
02831       INT32 iX,iY,iW,iH;
02832       INT32 iNumberOfLines = 1;
02833       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
02834       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02835 
02836 
02837       // grab the color for the background region
02838       usFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 240, 188));
02839       
02840 
02841       iX = pRegion->iX;
02842       iY = pRegion->iY;
02843       // get the width and height of the string
02844       //iW = (INT32)( pRegion->iW ) + 14;
02845       iW = (INT32)GetWidthOfString( pRegion->FastHelpText ) + 10;
02846 
02847       //iH = IanWrappedStringHeight( ( UINT16 )iX, ( UINT16 )iY, ( UINT16 )( pRegion->iW ), 0, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_BLACK, pRegion->FastHelpText, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, 0 );
02848       iH = (INT32)( GetNumberOfLinesInHeight( pRegion->FastHelpText ) * (GetFontHeight(FONT10ARIAL)+1) + 8 );
02849 
02850       // tack on the outer border
02851       iH += 14;
02852 
02853       // gone not far enough?
02854       if ( iX < 0 )
02855             iX = 0;
02856 
02857       // gone too far
02858       if ( ( pRegion->iX + iW ) >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
02859             iX = (SCREEN_WIDTH - iW - 4);
02860 
02861       // what about the y value?
02862       iY = (INT32)pRegion->iY - (  iH * 3 / 4);
02863 
02864       // not far enough
02865       if (iY < 0)
02866             iY = 0;
02867 
02868       // too far
02869       if ( (iY + iH) >= SCREEN_HEIGHT )
02870             iY = (SCREEN_HEIGHT - iH - 15);
02871 
02872       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
02873       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
02874       RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX + 1, iY + 1, iX + iW - 1, iY + iH - 1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 57, 15 ) ), pDestBuf );
02875       RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX, iY, iX + iW - 2, iY + iH - 2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 227, 198, 88 ) ), pDestBuf );
02876       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02877       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
02878       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
02879 
02880       // fillt he video surface areas
02881       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, iX, iY, (iX + iW), (iY + iH), 0);
02882       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, (iX + 1), (iY + 1), (iX + iW - 1), (iY + iH - 1), usFillColor);
02883 
02884       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
02885       SetFontForeground( FONT_BEIGE );
02886 
02887       //iH = ( INT32 )DisplayWrappedString( ( INT16 )( iX + 10 ), ( INT16 )( iY + 6 ), ( INT16 )pRegion->iW, 0, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_BEIGE, pRegion->FastHelpText, FONT_NEARBLACK, TRUE, 0 );
02888       
02889       DisplayHelpTokenizedString( pRegion->FastHelpText ,( INT16 )( iX + 5 ), ( INT16 )( iY + 5 ) );
02890       
02891       iHeightOfInitFastHelpText = iH + 20;
02892 
02893       InvalidateRegion(  iX, iY, (iX + iW) , (iY + iH + 20 ) );
02894 }

02904 void DisplayFastHelpForInitialTripInToMapScreen(  FASTHELPREGION *pRegion )
02905 {
02906       if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart )
02907       {
02908             if( AnyMercsHired() == FALSE )
02909             {
02910                   return;
02911             }
02912 
02913             HandleDisplayOfExitToTacticalMessageForFirstEntryToMapScreen( );
02914 // DEF: removed cause the help screen will replace the help screen
02915 //          DisplayFastHelpRegions( &pFastHelpMapScreenList[ 9 ], 1 );
02916 
02917       }
02918       else
02919       {
02920             DisplayFastHelpRegions( pFastHelpMapScreenList, giSizeOfInterfaceFastHelpTextList );
02921       }
02922 
02923       SetUpShutDownMapScreenHelpTextScreenMask( );
02924 
02925       return;
02926 }

02939 void SetUpMapScreenFastHelpText( void )
02940 {
02941       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02942 
02943       // now run through and display all the fast help text for the mapscreen functional regions
02944       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_MAPSCREEN_HELP_MESSAGES; iCounter++ )
02945       {
02946             pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].iX = pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ iCounter ].iX;
02947             pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].iY = pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ iCounter ].iY;
02948             pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].iW = pMapScreenFastHelpWidthList[ iCounter ];
02949             wcscpy( pFastHelpMapScreenList[ iCounter ].FastHelpText, pMapScreenFastHelpTextList[ iCounter ] );
02950       }
02951 
02952 // DEF: removed cause the help screen will replace the help screen
02953 /*
02954       pFastHelpMapScreenList[ 9 ].iX = pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ 9 ].iX;
02955       pFastHelpMapScreenList[ 9 ].iY = pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ 9 ].iY;
02956       pFastHelpMapScreenList[ 9 ].iW = pMapScreenFastHelpWidthList[ 9 ];
02957       wcscpy( pFastHelpMapScreenList[ 9 ].FastHelpText, pMapScreenFastHelpTextList[ 9 ] );
02958 */
02959       return;
02960 }
02961 
02962 void StopMapScreenHelpText( void )
02963 {
02964       fShowMapScreenHelpText = FALSE;
02965       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
02966       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
02967       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
02968       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
02969 
02970       SetUpShutDownMapScreenHelpTextScreenMask( );
02971       return;
02972 }
02973 
02974 BOOLEAN IsMapScreenHelpTextUp( void )
02975 {
02976       return( fShowMapScreenHelpText );
02977 }
02978 
02979 void SetUpShutDownMapScreenHelpTextScreenMask( void )
02980 {
02981       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
02982 
02983       // create or destroy the screen mask as needed
02984       if( ( ( fShowMapScreenHelpText == TRUE ) || ( fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive == TRUE ) ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
02985       {
02986             if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart )
02987             {
02988                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMapScreenHelpTextMask , ( INT16 )( pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ 9 ].iX ), ( INT16 )( pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ 9 ].iY ), ( INT16 )( pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ 9 ].iX + pMapScreenFastHelpWidthList[ 9 ] ), ( INT16 )( pMapScreenFastHelpLocationList[ 9 ].iY + iHeightOfInitFastHelpText ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, 
02989                         MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MapScreenHelpTextScreenMaskBtnCallback );
02990             }
02991             else
02992             {
02993                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMapScreenHelpTextMask , 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, 
02994                               MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MapScreenHelpTextScreenMaskBtnCallback );
02995             }
02996 
02997             fCreated = TRUE;
02998                   
02999       }
03000       else if( ( fShowMapScreenHelpText == FALSE ) && ( fInterfaceFastHelpTextActive == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
03001       {
03002             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMapScreenHelpTextMask );
03003 
03004             fCreated = FALSE;
03005       }
03006 }
03007 
03008 
03009 void MapScreenHelpTextScreenMaskBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03010 {
03011       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
03012       {
03013             // stop showing
03014             ShutDownUserDefineHelpTextRegions( );
03015       }
03016       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03017       {
03018             // stop showing
03019             ShutDownUserDefineHelpTextRegions( );
03020       }
03021 }

03024 BOOLEAN IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03025 {
03026       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03027 
03028       // run through the list and turn this soldiers value on
03029       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03030       {
03031             if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] == pSoldier ) && ( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] ) )
03032             {
03033                   return ( TRUE );
03034             }
03035       }
03036       return( FALSE );
03037 }
03038 
03039 BOOLEAN IsSquadSelectedForMovement( INT32 iSquadNumber )
03040 {
03041       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03042 
03043       // run through squad list and set them on
03044       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03045       {
03046             if( ( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] == iSquadNumber ) && ( fSquadIsMoving[ iCounter ] ) )
03047             {
03048                   return( TRUE );
03049             }
03050       }
03051 
03052       return( FALSE );
03053 }
03054

03057 {
03058       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03059 
03060       // run through squad list and set them on
03061       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03062       {
03063             if( ( iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] == iVehicleId ) && ( fVehicleIsMoving[ iCounter ] ) )
03064             {
03065                   return( TRUE );
03066             }
03067       }
03068       return( FALSE );
