03072 
03073 void SelectSoldierForMovement( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03074 {
03075       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03076 
03077       if( pSoldier == NULL )
03078       {
03079             return;
03080       }
03081 
03082       // run through the list and turn this soldiers value on
03083       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03084       {
03085             if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] == pSoldier )
03086             {
03087                   // turn the selected soldier ON
03088                   fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = TRUE;
03089                   break;
03090             }
03091       }
03092 }
03093 
03094 void DeselectSoldierForMovement( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03095 {
03096       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03097 
03098       if( pSoldier == NULL )
03099       {
03100             return;
03101       }
03102 
03103       // run through the list and turn this soldier's value on
03104       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03105       {
03106             if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] == pSoldier )
03107             {
03108                   // turn the selected soldier off
03109                   fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03110                   break;
03111             }
03112       }
03113 }
03114 
03115 
03116 void SelectSquadForMovement( INT32 iSquadNumber )
03117 {
03118       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
03119       BOOLEAN fSomeCantMove = FALSE;
03120       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
03121       BOOLEAN fFirstFailure;
03122 
03123 
03124       // run through squad list and set them on
03125       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03126       {
03127             if( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] == iSquadNumber )
03128             {
03129                   // found it
03130 
03131                   fFirstFailure = TRUE;
03132 
03133                   // try to select everyone in squad
03134                   for( iCount = 0; iCount < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCount++ )
03135                   {
03136                         pSoldier = Squad[ iSquadNumber ][ iCount ];
03137 
03138                         if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive )
03139                         {
03140                               // is he able & allowed to move?  (Report only the first reason for failure encountered)
03141                               if ( CanMoveBoxSoldierMoveStrategically( pSoldier, fFirstFailure ) )
03142                               {
03143                                     SelectSoldierForMovement( pSoldier );
03144                               }
03145                               else
03146                               {
03147                                     fSomeCantMove = TRUE;
03148                                     fFirstFailure = FALSE;
03149                               }
03150                         }
03151                   }
03152       
03153                   if ( !fSomeCantMove )
03154                   {
03155                         fSquadIsMoving[ iCounter ] = TRUE;
03156                   }
03157 
03158                   break;
03159             }
03160       }
03161 }
03162 
03163 
03164 
03165 void DeselectSquadForMovement( INT32 iSquadNumber )
03166 {
03167       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
03168       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
03169 
03170       // run through squad list and set them off
03171       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03172       {
03173             if( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] == iSquadNumber )
03174             {
03175                   // found it
03176                   fSquadIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03177 
03178                   // now deselect everyone in squad
03179                   for( iCount = 0; iCount < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCount++ )
03180                   {
03181                         pSoldier = Squad[ iSquadNumber ][ iCount ];
03182 
03183                         if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive )
03184                         {
03185                               DeselectSoldierForMovement( pSoldier );
03186                         }
03187                   }
03188 
03189                   break;
03190             }
03191       }
03192 }
03193 
03194 
03195 BOOLEAN AllSoldiersInSquadSelected( INT32 iSquadNumber )
03196 {
03197       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
03198 
03199       // is everyone on this squad moving?
03200       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03201       {
03202             if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ]->bAssignment == ( INT8 )iSquadNumber )
03203             {
03204                   if( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] == FALSE )
03205                   {
03206                         return( FALSE );
03207                   }
03208             }
03209       }
03210 
03211       return( TRUE );
03212 }
03213 
03214 
03215 
03216 void SelectVehicleForMovement( INT32 iVehicleId, BOOLEAN fAndAllOnBoard )
03217 {
03218       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
03219       SOLDIERTYPE *pPassenger = NULL;
03220       BOOLEAN fHasDriver = FALSE;
03221       BOOLEAN fFirstFailure;
03222 
03223 
03224       // run through vehicle list and set them on
03225       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03226       {
03227             if( iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] == iVehicleId )
03228             {
03229                   // found it
03230 
03231                   fFirstFailure = TRUE;
03232 
03233                   for( iCount = 0; iCount < 10; iCount++ )
03234                   {
03235                         pPassenger = pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].pPassengers[ iCount ];
03236 
03237                         if ( fAndAllOnBoard )
03238                         {
03239                               // try to select everyone in vehicle
03240 
03241                               if ( pPassenger && pPassenger->bActive )
03242                               {
03243                                     // is he able & allowed to move?
03244                                     if ( CanMoveBoxSoldierMoveStrategically( pPassenger, fFirstFailure ) )
03245                                     {
03246                                           SelectSoldierForMovement( pPassenger );
03247                                     }
03248                                     else
03249                                     {
03250                                           fFirstFailure = FALSE;
03251                                     }
03252                               }
03253                         }
03254 
03255                         if( IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pPassenger ) )
03256                         {
03257                               fHasDriver = TRUE;
03258                         }
03259                   }
03260 
03261                   // vehicle itself can only move if at least one passenger can move and is moving!
03262                   if ( fHasDriver )
03263                   {
03264                         fVehicleIsMoving[ iCounter ] = TRUE;
03265                   }
03266 
03267                   break;
03268             }
03269       }
03270 }
03271 
03272 void DeselectVehicleForMovement( INT32 iVehicleId )
03273 {
03274       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
03275       SOLDIERTYPE *pPassenger = NULL;
03276 
03277 
03278       // run through vehicle list and set them off
03279       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03280       {
03281             if( iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] == iVehicleId )
03282             {
03283                   // found it
03284                   fVehicleIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03285 
03286                   // now deselect everyone in vehicle
03287                   for( iCount = 0; iCount < 10 ; iCount++ )
03288                   {
03289                         pPassenger = pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].pPassengers[ iCount ];
03290 
03291                         if ( pPassenger && pPassenger->bActive )
03292                         {
03293                               DeselectSoldierForMovement( pPassenger );
03294                         }
03295                   }
03296 
03297                   break;
03298             }
03299       }
03300 }
03301 
03302 
03303 INT32 HowManyMovingSoldiersInVehicle( INT32 iVehicleId )
03304 {
03305       INT32 iNumber = 0, iCounter = 0;
03306 
03307       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03308       {
03309             // is he in the right vehicle 
03310             if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->bAssignment == VEHICLE )&&( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->iVehicleId == iVehicleId ) )
03311             {
03312                   // if he moving?
03313                   if ( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
03314                   {
03315                         // ok, another one in the vehicle that is going to move
03316                         iNumber++;
03317                   }
03318             }
03319       }
03320 
03321       return( iNumber );
03322 }
03323 
03324 INT32 HowManyMovingSoldiersInSquad( INT32 iSquadNumber )
03325 {
03326       INT32 iNumber = 0, iCounter = 0;
03327 
03328       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
03329       {
03330             // is he in the right squad
03331             if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->bAssignment == iSquadNumber )
03332             {
03333                   // if he moving?
03334                   if ( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
03335                   {
03336                         // ok, another one in the squad that is going to move
03337                         iNumber++;
03338                   }
03339             }
03340       }
03341 
03342       return( iNumber );
03343 }
03344 
03345 
03346 // try to add this soldier to the moving lists
03347 void AddSoldierToMovingLists( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03348 {
03349       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03350 
03351       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
03352       {
03353             if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] == pSoldier )
03354             {
03355                   // found
03356                   return;
03357             }
03358             else if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] == NULL )
03359             {
03360                   // found a free slot
03361                   pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] = pSoldier;
03362                   fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03363 
03364                   giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving++;
03365                   return;
03366             }
03367       }
03368       return;
03369 }
03370 
03371 
03372 // try to add this soldier to the moving lists
03373 void AddSquadToMovingLists( INT32 iSquadNumber )
03374 {
03375       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03376 
03377       if( iSquadNumber == -1 )
03378       {
03379             // invalid squad
03380             return;
03381       }
03382 
03383       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
03384       {
03385             if( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] == iSquadNumber )
03386             {
03387                   // found
03388                   return;
03389             }
03390             if( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] == -1 )
03391             {
03392                   // found a free slot
03393                   iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] = iSquadNumber;
03394                   fSquadIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03395 
03396                   giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving++;
03397                   return;
03398             }
03399       }
03400       return;
03401 }
03402 
03403 
03404 // try to add this soldier to the moving lists
03405 void AddVehicleToMovingLists( INT32 iVehicleId )
03406 {
03407       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03408 
03409       if( iVehicleId == -1 )
03410       {
03411             // invalid squad
03412             return;
03413       }
03414 
03415       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
03416       {
03417             if( iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] == iVehicleId )
03418             {
03419                   // found
03420                   return;
03421             }
03422             if( iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] == -1 )
03423             {
03424                   // found a free slot
03425                   iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] = iVehicleId;
03426                   fVehicleIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03427 
03428                   giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving++;
03429                   return;
03430             }
03431       }
03432       return;
03433 }
03434 
03435 
03436 
03437 void InitializeMovingLists( void )
03438 {
03439       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03440 
03441 
03442       giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving = 0;
03443       giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving   = 0;
03444       giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving = 0;
03445 
03446       // init the soldiers
03447       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
03448       {
03449             // soldier is NOT moving
03450             pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] = NULL;
03451             // turn the selected soldier off
03452             fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03453       }
03454 
03455 
03456       // init the squads
03457       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
03458       {
03459             // reset squad value
03460             iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] = -1;
03461             // turn it off
03462             fSquadIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03463       }
03464 
03465       // init the vehicles
03466       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
03467       {
03468             // reset squad value
03469             iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] = -1;
03470             // turn it off
03471             fVehicleIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
03472       }
03473 
03474       return;
03475 }     
03476 
03477 
03478 
03479 BOOLEAN     IsAnythingSelectedForMoving( void )
03480 {
03481       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03482 
03483 
03484       // check soldiers
03485       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
03486       {
03487             if ( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] != NULL ) && fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
03488             {
03489                   return( TRUE );
03490             }
03491       }
03492 
03493 
03494       // init the squads
03495       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
03496       {
03497             if ( ( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] != -1 ) && fSquadIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
03498             {
03499                   return( TRUE );
03500             }
03501       }
03502 
03503       // init the vehicles
03504       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
03505       {
03506             if ( ( iVehicleMovingList[ iCounter ] != -1 ) && fVehicleIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
03507             {
03508                   return( TRUE );
03509             }
03510       }
03511 
03512       return( FALSE );
03513 }
03514 
03515 
03516 
03517 void CreateDestroyMovementBox( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
03518 {
03519       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
03520 
03521 
03522       // not allowed for underground movement!
03523       Assert( sSectorZ == 0 );
03524 
03525       if( ( fShowMapScreenMovementList == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
03526       {
03527             fCreated = TRUE;
03528 
03529             // create the box and mouse regions
03530             CreatePopUpBoxForMovementBox( );
03531             BuildMouseRegionsForMoveBox( );
03532             CreateScreenMaskForMoveBox( );
03533       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
03534       }
03535       else if( ( fShowMapScreenMovementList == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
03536       {
03537             fCreated = FALSE;
03538 
03539             // destroy the box and mouse regions
03540             ClearMouseRegionsForMoveBox( );
03541             RemoveBox( ghMoveBox );
03542             ghMoveBox = -1;
03543             RemoveScreenMaskForMoveBox( );
03544       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
03545             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;       // really long move boxes can overlap bottom panel
03546       }
03547 
03548 }
03549 
03550 
03551 
03552 void SetUpMovingListsForSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
03553 {
03554       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03555       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
03556 
03557 
03558       // not allowed for underground movement!
03559       Assert( sSectorZ == 0 );
03560 
03561 
03562       // clear the lists
03563       InitializeMovingLists();
03564 
03565 
03566       // note that Skyrider can't be moved using the move box, and won't appear because the helicoprer is not in the char list
03567 
03568       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
03569       {
03570             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid )
03571             {
03572                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
03573 
03574                   if( ( pSoldier->bActive ) &&
03575                               ( pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW ) &&
03576                               ( pSoldier->sSectorX == sSectorX ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == sSectorY ) && ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == sSectorZ ) )
03577                   {
03578                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
03579                         {
03580                               // vehicle
03581                               // if it can move (can't be empty)
03582                               if ( GetNumberInVehicle( pSoldier->bVehicleID ) > 0 )
03583                               {
03584                                     // add vehicle
03585                                     AddVehicleToMovingLists( pSoldier->bVehicleID );
03586                               }
03587                         }
03588                         else // soldier
03589                         {
03590                               // alive, not aboard Skyrider (airborne or not!)
03591                               if ( ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE ) &&
03592                                            ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) || ( pSoldier->iVehicleId != iHelicopterVehicleId ) ) )
03593                               {
03594                                     // add soldier
03595                                     AddSoldierToMovingLists( pSoldier );
03596 
03597                                     // if on a squad, 
03598                                     if ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
03599                                     {
03600                                           // add squad (duplicates ok, they're ignored inside the function)
03601                                           AddSquadToMovingLists( pSoldier->bAssignment );
03602                                     }
03603                               }
03604                         }
03605                   }
03606             }
03607       }
03608 
03609       fShowMapScreenMovementList = TRUE;
03610       CreateDestroyMovementBox( sSectorX, sSectorY, sSectorZ );
03611 }
03612 
03613 
03614 
03615 void CreatePopUpBoxForMovementBox( void )
03616 {
03617       SGPPoint Position;
03618       SGPRect Dimensions;
03619 
03620       // create the pop up box and mouse regions for movement list
03621  
03622  // create basic box
03623  CreatePopUpBox(&ghMoveBox, AssignmentDimensions, MovePosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
03624  
03625  // which buffer will box render to
03626  SetBoxBuffer(ghMoveBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
03627 
03628  // border type?
03629  SetBorderType(ghMoveBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
03630 
03631  // background texture
03632  SetBackGroundSurface(ghMoveBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
03633 
03634  // margin sizes
03635  SetMargins( ghMoveBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
03636 
03637  // space between lines
03638  SetLineSpace(ghMoveBox, 2);
03639 
03640  // set current box to this one
03641  SetCurrentBox( ghMoveBox );
03642 
03643  // add strings
03644  AddStringsToMoveBox( );
03645 
03646 
03647  // set font type
03648  SetBoxFont(ghMoveBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
03649 
03650  // set highlight color
03651  SetBoxHighLight(ghMoveBox, FONT_WHITE);
03652 
03653  // unhighlighted color
03654  SetBoxForeground(ghMoveBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
03655 
03656  // make the header line WHITE
03657  SetBoxLineForeground( ghMoveBox, 0, FONT_WHITE );
03658 
03659  // make the done and cancel lines YELLOW
03660  SetBoxLineForeground( ghMoveBox, GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghMoveBox ) - 1, FONT_YELLOW );
03661 
03662       if ( IsAnythingSelectedForMoving() )
03663       {
03664             SetBoxLineForeground( ghMoveBox, GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghMoveBox ) - 2, FONT_YELLOW );
03665       }
03666 
03667  // background color
03668  SetBoxBackground(ghMoveBox, FONT_BLACK);
03669 
03670  // shaded color..for darkened text
03671  SetBoxShade( ghMoveBox, FONT_BLACK );
03672 
03673 
03674  // resize box to text
03675  ResizeBoxToText( ghMoveBox );
03676 
03677       GetBoxPosition( ghMoveBox, &Position);
03678       GetBoxSize( ghMoveBox, &Dimensions );
03679 
03680       // adjust position to try to keep it in the map area as best as possible
03681       if ( Position.iX + Dimensions.iRight >= ( MAP_VIEW_START_X + MAP_VIEW_WIDTH ) )
03682       {
03683             Position.iX = max( MAP_VIEW_START_X, ( MAP_VIEW_START_X + MAP_VIEW_WIDTH ) - Dimensions.iRight );
03684             SetBoxPosition( ghMoveBox, Position );
03685       }
03686 
03687       if ( Position.iY + Dimensions.iBottom >= ( MAP_VIEW_START_Y + MAP_VIEW_HEIGHT ) )
03688       {
03689             Position.iY = max( MAP_VIEW_START_Y, ( MAP_VIEW_START_Y + MAP_VIEW_HEIGHT ) - Dimensions.iBottom );
03690             SetBoxPosition( ghMoveBox, Position );
03691       }
03692 }
03693 
03694 
03695 
03696 void AddStringsToMoveBox( void )
03697 {
03698       INT32 iCount = 0, iCountB = 0;
03699       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ], sStringB[ 128 ];
03700       UINT32 hStringHandle;
03701       BOOLEAN fFirstOne = TRUE;
03702 
03703 
03704       // set the current box
03705       SetCurrentBox( ghMoveBox );
03706 
03707       // clear all the strings out of the box
03708       RemoveAllCurrentBoxStrings();
03709 
03710 
03711       // add title
03712       GetShortSectorString( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, sStringB );
03713       swprintf( sString, L"%s %s", pMovementMenuStrings[ 0 ], sStringB );
03714       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03715 
03716 
03717       // blank line
03718       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, L"" );
03719 
03720 
03721       // add squads
03722       for( iCount = 0; iCount < giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving; iCount++ )
03723       {
03724             // add this squad, now add all the grunts in it
03725             if( fSquadIsMoving[ iCount ] )
03726             {
03727                   swprintf( sString, L"*%s*", pSquadMenuStrings[iSquadMovingList[ iCount ] ] );
03728             }
03729             else
03730             {
03731                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pSquadMenuStrings[iSquadMovingList[ iCount ] ] );
03732             }
03733             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString ); 
03734 
03735             // now add all the grunts in it
03736             for( iCountB = 0; iCountB < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCountB++ )
03737             {
03738                   if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] -> bAssignment == iSquadMovingList[ iCount ] )
03739                   {
03740                         // add mercs in squads
03741                         if( IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] ) == TRUE )
03742                         {
03743                               swprintf( sString, L"   *%s*", pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ]->name );
03744                         }
03745                         else
03746                         {
03747                               swprintf( sString, L"   %s", pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ]->name );
03748                         }
03749                         AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03750                   }
03751             }
03752       }
03753 
03754 
03755       // add vehicles
03756       for( iCount = 0; iCount < giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving; iCount++ )
03757       {
03758             // add this vehicle
03759             if( fVehicleIsMoving[ iCount ] )
03760             {
03761                   swprintf( sString, L"*%s*", pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ iVehicleMovingList[ iCount ] ].ubVehicleType ] );
03762             }
03763             else
03764             {
03765                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ iVehicleMovingList[ iCount ]  ].ubVehicleType ] );
03766             }
03767             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString ); 
03768 
03769             // now add all the grunts in it
03770             for( iCountB = 0; iCountB < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCountB++ )
03771             {
03772                   if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] -> bAssignment == VEHICLE ) &&( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] -> iVehicleId == iVehicleMovingList[ iCount ] ) )
03773                   {
03774                         // add mercs in vehicles
03775                         if( IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] ) == TRUE )
03776                         {
03777                               swprintf( sString, L"   *%s*", pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ]->name );
03778                         }
03779                         else
03780                         {
03781                               swprintf( sString, L"   %s", pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ]->name );
03782                         }
03783                         AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03784                   }
03785             }
03786       }
03787 
03788 
03789       fFirstOne = TRUE;
03790 
03791       // add "other" soldiers heading, once, if there are any
03792       for( iCount = 0; iCount < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCount++ )
03793       {
03794             // not on duty, not in a vehicle
03795             if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
03796             {
03797                   if ( fFirstOne )
03798                   {
03799                         // add OTHER header line
03800                         if( AllOtherSoldiersInListAreSelected( ) )
03801                         {
03802                               swprintf( sString, L"*%s*", pMovementMenuStrings[ 3 ] );
03803                         }
03804                         else
03805                         {
03806                               swprintf( sString, L"%s", pMovementMenuStrings[ 3 ] );
03807                         }
03808                         AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03809 
03810                         fFirstOne = FALSE;
03811                   }
03812 
03813                   // add OTHER soldiers (not on duty nor in a vehicle)
03814                   if( IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ] ) == TRUE )
03815                   {
03816                         swprintf( sString, L"  *%s ( %s )*", pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->name, pAssignmentStrings[  pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->bAssignment ] );
03817                   }
03818                   else
03819                   {
03820                         swprintf( sString, L"   %s ( %s )", pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->name, pAssignmentStrings[  pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->bAssignment ] );
03821                   }
03822                   AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03823             }
03824       }
03825 
03826 
03827       // blank line
03828       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, L"" );
03829 
03830 
03831       if ( IsAnythingSelectedForMoving() )
03832       {
03833             // add PLOT MOVE line
03834             swprintf( sString, L"%s", pMovementMenuStrings[ 1 ] );
03835             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03836       }
03837       else
03838       {
03839             // blank line
03840             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, L"" );
03841       }
03842       
03843 
03844       // add cancel line
03845       swprintf( sString, L"%s", pMovementMenuStrings[ 2 ] );
03846       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
03847 
03848       return;
03849 }
03850 
03851 
03852 void BuildMouseRegionsForMoveBox( void )
03853 {
03854       INT32 iCounter = 0, iTotalNumberOfLines = 0, iCount = 0, iCountB = 0;
03855       SGPPoint pPosition;
03856       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
03857       SGPRect Dimensions;
03858       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
03859       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
03860       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
03861       BOOLEAN fDefinedOtherRegion = FALSE;
03862 
03863 
03864       // grab height of font
03865       iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghMoveBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghMoveBox ) ); 
03866 
03867       // get x.y position of box
03868       GetBoxPosition( ghMoveBox, &pPosition);
03869 
03870       // grab box x and y position
03871       iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
03872       iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY + GetTopMarginSize( ghMoveBox ) - 2; // -2 to improve highlighting accuracy between lines
03873 
03874 
03875       // get dimensions..mostly for width
03876       GetBoxSize( ghMoveBox, &Dimensions );
03877 
03878       // get width
03879       iBoxWidth = Dimensions.iRight;
03880 
03881       SetCurrentBox( ghMoveBox );
03882 
03883 
03884       // box heading
03885       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03886                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
03887       iCounter++;
03888 
03889       // blank line
03890       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03891                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
03892       iCounter++;
03893 
03894       // calc total number of "moving" lines in the box
03895       iTotalNumberOfLines = giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving + giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving + giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving;
03896       // add the blank lines
03897       iTotalNumberOfLines += iCounter;
03898 
03899 
03900       // now add the strings
03901       while( iCounter < iTotalNumberOfLines )
03902       {
03903             // define regions for squad lines
03904             for( iCount = 0; iCount < giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving; iCount++ )
03905             {
03906                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03907                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
03908 
03909                   // set user defines
03910                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
03911                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, SQUAD_REGION );
03912                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, iCount );
03913                   iCounter++;
03914 
03915                   for( iCountB = 0; iCountB < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCountB++ )
03916                   {
03917                         if( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] -> bAssignment == iSquadMovingList[ iCount ] )
03918                         {
03919                               MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03920                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
03921 
03922                               // set user defines
03923                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
03924                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, SOLDIER_REGION );
03925                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, iCountB );
03926                               iCounter++;
03927                         }
03928                   }
03929             }
03930 
03931             for( iCount = 0; iCount < giNumberOfVehiclesInSectorMoving; iCount++ )
03932             {
03933                   // define regions for vehicle lines
03934                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03935                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
03936 
03937                   // set user defines
03938                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
03939                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, VEHICLE_REGION );
03940                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, iCount );
03941                   iCounter++;
03942 
03943                   for( iCountB = 0; iCountB < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCountB++ )
03944                   {
03945                         if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] -> bAssignment == VEHICLE ) &&( pSoldierMovingList[ iCountB ] -> iVehicleId == iVehicleMovingList[ iCount ] ) )
03946                         {
03947                               MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03948                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
03949 
03950                               // set user defines
03951                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
03952                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, SOLDIER_REGION );
03953                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, iCountB );
03954                               iCounter++;
03955                         }
03956                   }
03957             }
03958 
03959             
03960             // define regions for "other" soldiers
03961             for( iCount = 0; iCount < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCount++ )
03962             {
03963                   // this guy is not in a squad or vehicle
03964                   if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY )&&( pSoldierMovingList[ iCount ]->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
03965                   {
03966                         // this line gets place only once...
03967                         if( !fDefinedOtherRegion )
03968                         {
03969                               MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03970                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
03971 
03972                               // set user defines
03973                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
03974                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, OTHER_REGION );
03975                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, 0 );
03976                               iCounter++;
03977 
03978                               fDefinedOtherRegion = TRUE;
03979                         }
03980 
03981                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03982                               MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
03983 
03984                         // set user defines
03985                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
03986                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, SOLDIER_REGION );
03987                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, iCount );
03988                         iCounter++;
03989                   }
03990             }
03991       }
03992 
03993 
03994       // blank line
03995       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
03996                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
03997       iCounter++;
03998 
03999 
04000       if ( IsAnythingSelectedForMoving() )
04001       {
04002             // DONE line
04003             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
04004                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
04005 
04006             // set user defines
04007             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
04008             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, DONE_REGION );
04009             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, 0 );
04010             iCounter++;
04011       }
04012       else
04013       {
04014             // blank line
04015             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
04016                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
04017             iCounter++;
04018       }
04019 
04020       // CANCEL line
04021       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + iFontHeight * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
04022                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MoveMenuMvtCallback, MoveMenuBtnCallback );
04023 
04024       // set user defines
04025       MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
04026       MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 1, CANCEL_REGION );
04027       MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 2, 0 );
04028       iCounter++;
04029 }
04030 
04031 void ClearMouseRegionsForMoveBox( void )
04032 {
04033       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04034 
04035       // run through list of mouse regions
04036       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ( INT32 )GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghMoveBox ); iCounter++ )
04037       {
04038             // remove this region
04039             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMoveMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
04040       }
04041 
04042       return;
04043 }
04044 
04045 
04046 
04047 void MoveMenuMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04048 {
04049       // mvt callback handler for move box line regions
04050       INT32 iValue = -1;
04051 
04052 
04053       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04054 
04055       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
04056       {
04057             // highlight string
04058         HighLightBoxLine( ghMoveBox, iValue );
04059       }
04060       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
04061       {
04062             // unhighlight all strings in box
04063             UnHighLightBox( ghMoveBox );
04064       }
04065 }
04066 
04067 
04068 
04069 void MoveMenuBtnCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04070 {
04071       // btn callback handler for move box line regions
04072       INT32 iMoveBoxLine = -1, iRegionType = -1, iListIndex = -1, iClickTime = 0;
04073       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04074 
04075 
04076       iMoveBoxLine = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04077       iRegionType  = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
04078       iListIndex   = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 2 );
04079       iClickTime   = GetJA2Clock();
04080 
04081       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )  )
04082       {
04083             if( iClickTime - giDblClickTimersForMoveBoxMouseRegions[ iMoveBoxLine ] < DBL_CLICK_DELAY_FOR_MOVE_MENU  )
04084             {
04085                   // dbl click, and something is selected?
04086                   if ( IsAnythingSelectedForMoving() )
04087                   {
04088                         // treat like DONE
04089                         HandleMoveoutOfSectorMovementTroops( );
04090                         return;
04091                   }
04092             }
04093             else
04094             {
04095                   giDblClickTimersForMoveBoxMouseRegions[ iMoveBoxLine ] = iClickTime;
04096 
04097                   if( iRegionType == SQUAD_REGION )
04098                   {
04099                         // is the squad moving
04100                         if( fSquadIsMoving[ iListIndex ] == TRUE )
04101                         {
04102                               // squad stays
04103                               DeselectSquadForMovement( iSquadMovingList[ iListIndex ] );
04104                         }
04105                         else
04106                         {
04107                               // squad goes
04108                               SelectSquadForMovement( iSquadMovingList[ iListIndex ] );
04109                         }
04110                   }
04111                   else if( iRegionType == VEHICLE_REGION )
04112                   {
04113                         // is the vehicle moving
04114                         if( fVehicleIsMoving[ iListIndex ] == TRUE )
04115                         {
04116                               // vehicle stays
04117                               DeselectVehicleForMovement( iVehicleMovingList[ iListIndex ] );
04118                         }
04119                         else
04120                         {
04121                               // vehicle goes
04122                               SelectVehicleForMovement( iVehicleMovingList[ iListIndex ], AND_ALL_ON_BOARD );
04123                         }
04124                   }
04125                   else if( iRegionType == OTHER_REGION )
04126                   {
04127                         if( AllOtherSoldiersInListAreSelected( ) == TRUE )
04128                         {
04129                               // deselect all others in the list
04130                               DeselectAllOtherSoldiersInList( );
04131                         }
04132                         else
04133                         {
04134                               // select all others in the list
04135                               SelectAllOtherSoldiersInList( );
04136                         }
04137                   }
04138                   else if( iRegionType == SOLDIER_REGION )
04139                   {
04140                         pSoldier = pSoldierMovingList[ iListIndex ];
04141 
04142                         if ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
04143                         {
04144                               // we don't allow mercs to change squads or get out of vehicles between sectors, easiest way to handle this
04145                               // is to prevent any toggling of individual soldiers on the move at the outset.
04146                               DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pMapErrorString[ 41 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
04147                               return;
04148                         }
04149 
04150                         // if soldier is currently selected to move
04151                         if( IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pSoldier ) )
04152                         {
04153                               // change him to NOT move instead
04154 
04155                               if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
04156                               {
04157                                     // if he's the only one left moving in the vehicle, deselect whole vehicle
04158                                     if( HowManyMovingSoldiersInVehicle( pSoldier->iVehicleId ) == 1 )
04159                                     {
04160                                           // whole vehicle stays
04161                                           DeselectVehicleForMovement( pSoldier->iVehicleId );
04162                                     }
04163                                     else
04164                                     {
04165                                           // soldier is staying behind
04166                                           DeselectSoldierForMovement( pSoldier );
04167                                     }
04168                               }
04169                               else if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
04170                               {
04171                                     // if he's the only one left moving in the squad, deselect whole squad
04172                                     if( HowManyMovingSoldiersInSquad( pSoldier->bAssignment ) == 1 )
04173                                     {
04174                                           // whole squad stays
04175                                           DeselectSquadForMovement( pSoldier->bAssignment );
04176                                     }
04177                                     else
04178                                     {
04179                                           // soldier is staying behind
04180                                           DeselectSoldierForMovement( pSoldier );
04181                                     }
04182                               }
04183                               else
04184                               {
04185                                     // soldier is staying behind
04186                                     DeselectSoldierForMovement( pSoldier );
04187                               }
04188                         }
04189                         else  // currently NOT moving
04190                         {
04191                               // is he able & allowed to move?  (Errors with a reason are reported within)
04192                               if ( CanMoveBoxSoldierMoveStrategically( pSoldier, TRUE ) )
04193                               {
04194                                     // change him to move instead
04195                                     SelectSoldierForMovement( pSoldier );
04196 
04197                                     if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
04198                                     {
04199                                           // if everyone in the squad is now selected, select the squad itself
04200                                           if( AllSoldiersInSquadSelected( pSoldier->bAssignment ) )
04201                                           {
04202                                                 SelectSquadForMovement( pSoldier->bAssignment );
04203                                           }
04204                                     }
04205 /* ARM: it's more flexible without this - player can take the vehicle along or not without having to exit it.
04206                                     else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
04207                                     {
04208                                           // his vehicle MUST also go while he's moving, but not necessarily others on board
04209                                           SelectVehicleForMovement( pSoldier->iVehicleId, VEHICLE_ONLY );
04210                                     }
04211 */
04212                               }
04213                         }
04214                   }
04215                   else if( iRegionType == DONE_REGION )
04216                   {
04217                         // is something selected?
04218                         if ( IsAnythingSelectedForMoving() )
04219                         {
04220                               HandleMoveoutOfSectorMovementTroops( );
04221                               return;
04222                         }
04223                   }
04224                   else if( iRegionType == CANCEL_REGION )
04225                   {
04226                         fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
04227                         return;
04228                   }
04229                   else
04230                   {
04231                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "MoveMenuBtnCallback: Invalid regionType %d, moveBoxLine %d", iRegionType, iMoveBoxLine ) );
04232                         return;
04233                   }
04234       
04235                   fRebuildMoveBox = TRUE;
04236                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04237                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04238                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04239                   MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
04240             }
04241       }
04242 
04243       return;
04244 }
04245 
04246 
04247 
04248 BOOLEAN CanMoveBoxSoldierMoveStrategically( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fShowErrorMessage )
04249 {
04250       INT8 bErrorNumber = -1;
04251 
04252       // valid soldier?
04253       Assert( pSoldier );
04254       Assert( pSoldier->bActive );
04255 
04256 
04257       if( CanCharacterMoveInStrategic( pSoldier, &bErrorNumber ) )
04258       {
04259             return( TRUE );
04260       }
04261       else
04262       {
04263             // function may fail without returning any specific error # (-1).
04264             // if it gave us the # of an error msg, and we were told to display it
04265             if ( ( bErrorNumber != -1 ) && fShowErrorMessage )
04266             {
04267                   ReportMapScreenMovementError( bErrorNumber );
04268             }
04269 
04270             return( FALSE );
04271       }
04272 }
04273 
04274 
04275 
04276 void SelectAllOtherSoldiersInList( void )
04277 {
04278       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04279       BOOLEAN fSomeCantMove = FALSE;
04280 
04281       
04282       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
04283       {
04284             if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
04285             {
04286                   if ( CanMoveBoxSoldierMoveStrategically( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ], FALSE ) )
04287                   {
04288                         fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = TRUE;
04289                   }
04290                   else
04291                   {
04292                         fSomeCantMove = TRUE;
04293                   }
04294             }
04295       }
04296 
04297       if ( fSomeCantMove )
04298       {
04299             // can't - some of the OTHER soldiers can't move
04300             ReportMapScreenMovementError( 46 );
04301       }
04302 }
04303 
04304 
04305 
04306 void DeselectAllOtherSoldiersInList( void )
04307 {
04308       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04309       
04310       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
04311       {
04312             if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ] ->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
04313             {
04314                   fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
04315             }
04316       }
04317 }
04318 
04319 
04320 
04321 void HandleMoveoutOfSectorMovementTroops( void )
04322 {
04323       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04324       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = 0;
04325       INT32 iSquadNumber = -1;
04326       BOOLEAN fCheckForCompatibleSquad = FALSE;
04327 
04328 
04329       // cancel move box
04330       fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
04331 
04332 
04333       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
04334       {
04335             pSoldier = pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ];
04336 
04337             fCheckForCompatibleSquad = FALSE;
04338 
04339             // if he is on a valid squad
04340             if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
04341             {
04342                   // if he and his squad are parting ways (soldier is staying behind, but squad is leaving, or vice versa)
04343                   if( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] != IsSquadSelectedForMovement( pSoldier->bAssignment ) )
04344                   {
04345                         // split the guy from his squad to any other compatible squad
04346                         fCheckForCompatibleSquad = TRUE;
04347                   }
04348             }
04349             // if in a vehicle
04350             else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
04351             {
04352                   // if he and his vehicle are parting ways (soldier is staying behind, but vehicle is leaving, or vice versa)
04353                   if( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] != IsVehicleSelectedForMovement( pSoldier->iVehicleId ) )
04354                   {
04355                         // split the guy from his vehicle to any other compatible squad
04356                         fCheckForCompatibleSquad = TRUE;
04357                   }
04358             }
04359             else  // on his own - not on a squad or in a vehicle
04360             {
04361                   // if he's going anywhere
04362                   if( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
04363                   {
04364                         // find out if anyone is going with this guy...see if he can tag along
04365                         fCheckForCompatibleSquad = TRUE;
04366                   }
04367             }
04368 
04369 
04370             if ( fCheckForCompatibleSquad )
04371             {
04372                   // look for a squad that's doing the same thing as this guy is and has room for him
04373                   iSquadNumber = FindSquadThatSoldierCanJoin( pSoldier );
04374                   if( iSquadNumber != -1 )
04375                   {
04376                         if ( !AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, ( INT8 )( iSquadNumber ) ) )
04377                         {
04378                               AssertMsg( 0, String( "HandleMoveoutOfSectorMovementTroops: AddCharacterToSquad %d failed, iCounter %d", iSquadNumber, iCounter ) );
04379                               // toggle whether he's going or not to try and recover somewhat gracefully
04380                               fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = !fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ];
04381                         }
04382                   }
04383                   else
04384                   {
04385                         // no existing squad is compatible, will have to start his own new squad
04386                         iSquadNumber = AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pSoldier );
04387                         if ( iSquadNumber != -1 )
04388                         {
04389                               // It worked.  Add his new squad to the "moving squads" list so others can join it, too!
04390                               AddSquadToMovingLists( iSquadNumber );
04391 
04392                               // If this guy is moving
04393                               if( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] )
04394                               {
04395                                     // mark this new squad as moving too, so those moving can join it
04396                                     SelectSquadForMovement( iSquadNumber );
04397                               }
04398                         }
04399                         else
04400                         {
04401                               // failed - should never happen!
04402                               AssertMsg( 0, String( "HandleMoveoutOfSectorMovementTroops: AddCharacterToUniqueSquad failed, iCounter %d", iCounter ) );
04403                               // toggle whether he's going or not to try and recover somewhat gracefully
04404                               fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] = !fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ];
04405                         }
04406                   }
04407             }
04408 
04409       }
04410 
04411       // now actually set the list
04412       HandleSettingTheSelectedListOfMercs( );
04413 
04414       return;
04415 }
04416 
04417 
04418 void HandleSettingTheSelectedListOfMercs( void )
04419 {
04420       BOOLEAN fFirstOne = TRUE;
04421       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04422       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04423       BOOLEAN fSelected;
04424 
04425 
04426       // reset the selected character
04427       bSelectedDestChar = -1;
04428 
04429       // run through the list of grunts
04430       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
04431       {
04432             // is the current guy a valid character?
04433             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
04434             {
04435                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
04436 
04437                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
04438                   {
04439                         fSelected = IsVehicleSelectedForMovement( pSoldier->bVehicleID );
04440                   }
04441                   else
04442                   {
04443                         fSelected = IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pSoldier );
04444                   }
04445 
04446                   // is he/she selected for movement?
04447                   if( fSelected )
04448                   {
04449                         // yes, are they the first one to be selected?
04450                         if( fFirstOne == TRUE )
04451                         {
04452                               // yes, then set them as the destination plotting character for movement arrow purposes
04453                               fFirstOne = FALSE;
04454 
04455                               bSelectedDestChar = ( INT8 )iCounter;
04456                               // make DEST column glow
04457                               giDestHighLine = iCounter;
04458 
04459                               ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iCounter, TRUE );
04460                         }
04461 
04462                         // add this guy to the selected list of grunts
04463                         SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( ( INT8 )iCounter );
04464                   }
04465             }
04466       }
04467 
04468       if( bSelectedDestChar != -1 )
04469       {
04470             // set cursor
04471             SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
04472             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04473             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04474             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04475 
04476             DeselectSelectedListMercsWhoCantMoveWithThisGuy( &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] ) );
04477 
04478             // remember the current paths for all selected characters so we can restore them if need be
04479             RememberPreviousPathForAllSelectedChars();
04480       }
04481 }
04482 
04483 
04484 /*
04485 INT32 GetSquadListIndexForSquadNumber( INT32 iSquadNumber )
04486 {
04487       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04488 
04489       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSquadsInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
04490       {
04491             if( iSquadMovingList[ iCounter ] == iSquadNumber )
04492             {
04493                   return( iCounter );
04494             }
04495       }
04496 
04497       return( -1 );
04498 }
04499 */
04500 
04501 
04502 BOOLEAN AllOtherSoldiersInListAreSelected( void )
04503 {
04504       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
04505 
04506       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfSoldiersInSectorMoving; iCounter++ )
04507       {
04508             if( ( pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ]->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && (  pSoldierMovingList[ iCounter ]->bAssignment >= VEHICLE ) )
04509             {
04510                   if( fSoldierIsMoving[ iCounter ] == FALSE )
04511                   {
04512                         return( FALSE );
04513                   }
04514 
04515                   iCount++;
04516             }
04517       }
04518 
04519       // some merc on other assignments and no result?
04520       if( iCount )
04521       {
04522             return( TRUE );
04523       }
04524 
04525       return( FALSE );
04526 }
04527 
04528 
04529 BOOLEAN IsThisSquadInThisSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ, INT8 bSquadValue )
04530 {
04531       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
04532       INT8 bZ = 0;
04533 
04534       // check if the squad is empty
04535       if( SquadIsEmpty( bSquadValue ) == FALSE )
04536       {
04537             // now grab the squad location
04538             GetLocationOfSquad( &sX, &sY, &bZ, bSquadValue );
04539 
04540             // check if this non-empty squad is in this sector
04541             if( ( sX == sSectorX ) && ( sY == sSectorY ) && ( bSectorZ == bZ ) )
04542             {
04543                   // a squad that's between sectors isn't *in* this sector
04544                   if( !IsThisSquadOnTheMove( bSquadValue ) )
04545                   {
04546                         // yep
04547                         return( TRUE );
04548                   }
04549             }
04550       }
04551 
04552       // nope
04553       return( FALSE );
04554 }
04555 
04556 
04557 INT8 FindSquadThatSoldierCanJoin( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04558 {
04559       // look for a squad that isn't full that can take this character
04560       INT8 bCounter = 0;
04561 
04562       // run through the list of squads
04563       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; bCounter++ )
04564       {
04565             // is this squad in this sector
04566             if( IsThisSquadInThisSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ, bCounter ) )
04567             {
04568                   // does it have room?
04569                   if( IsThisSquadFull( bCounter ) == FALSE )
04570                   {
04571                         // is it doing the same thing as the soldier is (staying or going) ?
04572                         if( IsSquadSelectedForMovement( bCounter ) == IsSoldierSelectedForMovement( pSoldier ) )
04573                         {
04574                               // go ourselves a match, then
04575                               return( bCounter );
04576                         }
04577                   }
04578             }
04579       }
04580 
04581       return( -1 );
04582 }
04583 
04584 void ReBuildMoveBox( void )
04585 {
04586       // check to see if we need to rebuild the movement box and mouse regions
04587       if( fRebuildMoveBox == FALSE )
04588       {
04589             return;
04590       }
04591 
04592       // reset the fact
04593       fRebuildMoveBox = FALSE;
04594       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04595       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04596       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04597 
04598       // stop showing the box
04599       fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
04600       CreateDestroyMovementBox( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT16 )iCurrentMapSectorZ );
04601       
04602       // show the box
04603       fShowMapScreenMovementList = TRUE;
04604       CreateDestroyMovementBox( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT16 )iCurrentMapSectorZ );
04605       ShowBox( ghMoveBox );
04606       MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
04607 }
04608 
04609 
04610 void CreateScreenMaskForMoveBox( void )
04611 {
04612       if( fScreenMaskForMoveCreated == FALSE )
04613       {
04614             // set up the screen mask
04615             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMoveBoxScreenMask, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4, 
04616             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MoveScreenMaskBtnCallback );
04617       
04618             fScreenMaskForMoveCreated = TRUE;
04619       }
04620 }
04621 
04622 void RemoveScreenMaskForMoveBox( void )
04623 {
04624       if( fScreenMaskForMoveCreated == TRUE )
04625       {
04626             // remove the screen mask
04627             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMoveBoxScreenMask );
04628             fScreenMaskForMoveCreated = FALSE;
04629       }
04630 }
04631 
04632 
04633 void MoveScreenMaskBtnCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04634 {
04635       // btn callback handler for move box screen mask region
04636       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )  )
04637       {
04638             fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
04639       }
04640       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
04641       {
04642             sSelectedMilitiaTown = 0;
04643 
04644             // are we showing the update box
04645             if( fShowUpdateBox )
04646             {
04647                   fShowUpdateBox = FALSE;
04648             }
04649       }
04650 
04651       return;
04652 }
04653 
04654 void ResetSoldierUpdateBox( void )
04655 {
04656       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04657 
04658       // delete any loaded faces
04659       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SIZE_OF_UPDATE_BOX; iCounter++ )
04660       {
04661             if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] != NULL )
04662             {
04663                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giUpdateSoldierFaces[ iCounter ] );
04664             }
04665       }
04666 
04667       if( giMercPanelImage != 0 )
04668       {
04669             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giMercPanelImage );
04670       }
04671 
04672       // reset the soldier ptrs in the update box
04673       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SIZE_OF_UPDATE_BOX; iCounter++ )
04674       {
04675             pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] = NULL;
04676       }
04677 
04678       
04679       return;
04680 }
04681 
04682 
04683 INT32 GetNumberOfMercsInUpdateList( void )
04684 {
04685       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
04686 
04687       // run through the non-empty slots
04688       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SIZE_OF_UPDATE_BOX; iCounter++ )
04689       {
04690             // valid guy here
04691             if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] != NULL )
04692             {
04693                   iCount++;
04694             }
04695       }
04696 
04697       return( iCount );
04698 }
04699 
04700 BOOLEAN IsThePopUpBoxEmpty( void )
04701 {
04702       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04703       BOOLEAN fEmpty = TRUE;
04704 
04705       // run through the non-empty slots
04706       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SIZE_OF_UPDATE_BOX; iCounter++ )
04707       {
04708             // valid guy here
04709             if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] != NULL )
04710             {
04711                   fEmpty = FALSE;
04712             }
04713       }
04714 
04715       return( fEmpty );
04716 }
04717

04720 {

04726

04728       return;
04729 }

04733 {
