04745 }
04746 
04747 
04748 void ShowUpdateBox( void )
04749 {
04750       // we want to show the box
04751       fShowUpdateBox = TRUE;
04752 }
04753 
04754 void AddSoldierToUpdateBox( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04755 {
04756       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04757       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
04758 
04759       
04760 
04761       // going to load face
04762       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
04763       
04764       if( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
04765       {
04766             return;
04767       }
04768 
04769       if( pSoldier -> bActive == FALSE )
04770       {
04771             return;
04772       }
04773 
04774       // if update 
04775       if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] == NULL )
04776       {
04777             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\panels.sti" );
04778             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giMercPanelImage ) )
04779             {
04780                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\panels.sti" );
04781             }
04782       }
04783 
04784       // run thought list of update soldiers
04785       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SIZE_OF_UPDATE_BOX; iCounter++ )
04786       {
04787             // find a free slot
04788             if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] == NULL )
04789             {
04790                   // add to box
04791                   pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] = pSoldier;
04792                   
04793                   if( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex < 100 )
04794                   {
04795                         // grab filename of face
04796                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%02d.sti", gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
04797                   }
04798                   else
04799                   {
04800                         // grab filename of face
04801                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%03d.sti", gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
04802                   }
04803 
04804                   // load the face
04805                   AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giUpdateSoldierFaces[ iCounter ] );
04806                   
04807                   return;
04808             }
04809       }
04810       return;
04811 }
04812 
04813 void SetSoldierUpdateBoxReason( INT32 iReason )
04814 {
04815       //set the reason for the update
04816       iReasonForSoldierUpDate = iReason;
04817 
04818       return;
04819 }
04820 
04821 
04822 void DisplaySoldierUpdateBox( )
04823 {
04824       INT32 iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel = 0;
04825       INT32 iNumberHigh = 0, iNumberWide = 0;
04826       INT32 iUpdatePanelWidth = 0, iUpdatePanelHeight = 0;
04827       INT32 iX = 0, iY = 0;
04828       INT32 iFaceX = 0, iFaceY = 0;
04829       BOOLEAN fFourWideMode = FALSE;
04830       HVOBJECT hBackGroundHandle;
04831       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04832       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
04833       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
04834       INT32 iHeightOfString = 0;
04835       INT32 iCounterB = 0;
04836       INT32 iOrigNumberHigh = 0, iOrigY = 0;
04837       INT32 iUpperLimit = 0;  
04838       
04839       
04840       if( fShowUpdateBox == FALSE )
04841       {
04842             return;
04843       }
04844       
04845 
04846       // get the number of mercs
04847       iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel = GetNumberOfMercsInUpdateList( );
04848 
04849       if( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel == 0 )
04850       {
04851             // nobody home
04852             fShowUpdateBox = FALSE;
04853             // unpause
04854             UnPauseDialogueQueue( );
04855             return;
04856       }
04857 
04858       giSleepHighLine = -1;
04859       giDestHighLine = -1;
04860       giContractHighLine = -1;
04861       giAssignHighLine = -1;
04862 
04863 
04864       //InterruptTime();
04865       PauseGame( );
04866       LockPauseState( 4 );
04867 
04868       PauseDialogueQueue( );
04869 
04870       // do we have enough for 4 wide, or just 2 wide?
04871       if( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel > NUMBER_OF_MERCS_FOR_FOUR_WIDTH_UPDATE_PANEL )
04872       {
04873             fFourWideMode = TRUE;
04874       }
04875 
04876       // get number of rows
04877       iNumberHigh = ( fFourWideMode ?  iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel / NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE 
04878             :  iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel / NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE);
04879 
04880       //number of columns 
04881       iNumberWide = ( fFourWideMode ? NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE 
04882             : NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE );
04883 
04884 
04885 
04886       // get the height and width of the box .. will need to add in stuff for borders, lower panel...etc
04887       if( fFourWideMode )
04888       {
04889             // do we need an extra row for left overs
04890             if( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel % NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE )
04891             {
04892                   iNumberHigh++;
04893             }
04894       }
04895       else
04896       {
04897             // do we need an extra row for left overs
04898             if( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel % NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE )
04899             {
04900                   iNumberHigh++;
04901             }
04902       }
04903 
04904             // round off 
04905       if( fFourWideMode ) 
04906       {
04907             if(iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel % NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE )
04908             {
04909                   iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel += NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE - ( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel % NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE );
04910             }
04911       }
04912       else 
04913       {
04914             if(iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel % NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE )
04915             {
04916                   iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel += NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE - ( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel % NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE );
04917             }
04918       }
04919 
04920       iUpdatePanelWidth = iNumberWide * TACT_WIDTH_OF_UPDATE_PANEL_BLOCKS;
04921 
04922       iUpdatePanelHeight = ( iNumberHigh + 1 ) * TACT_HEIGHT_OF_UPDATE_PANEL_BLOCKS;
04923 
04924       // WANNE 2
04925       iX = (MAP_BORDER_X + ((SCREEN_WIDTH - MAP_BORDER_X) / 2)) - (iUpdatePanelWidth / 2);
04926       iY = (MAP_BORDER_Y + ((SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121) / 2)) - (iUpdatePanelHeight / 2);
04927 
04928       GetVideoObject( &hBackGroundHandle, guiUpdatePanelTactical );
04929 
04930       //Display the 2 TOP corner pieces
04931       BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hBackGroundHandle, 0, iX-4, iY - 4 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04932       BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hBackGroundHandle, 2, iX+iUpdatePanelWidth, iY - 4 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04933 
04934       if( fFourWideMode ) 
04935       {
04936             //Display 2 vertical lines starting at the bottom
04937             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 3, iX - 4, iY + iUpdatePanelHeight - 3 - 70, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04938             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 5, iX + iUpdatePanelWidth, iY + iUpdatePanelHeight - 3 - 70, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04939 
04940             //Display the 2 bottom corner pieces
04941             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hBackGroundHandle, 0, iX-4, iY + iUpdatePanelHeight - 3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04942             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hBackGroundHandle, 2, iX+iUpdatePanelWidth, iY + iUpdatePanelHeight - 3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04943       }
04944 
04945 
04946       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
04947       
04948       iUpperLimit = fFourWideMode ? ( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel + NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_FOUR_WIDE_MODE ) : ( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel + NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE );
04949 
04950       //need to put the background down first
04951       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iUpperLimit; iCounter++ )
04952       {
04953             // blt the face and name
04954 
04955             // get the face x and y
04956             iFaceX = iX + ( iCounter % iNumberWide ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH;  
04957             iFaceY = iY + ( iCounter / iNumberWide ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT;
04958 
04959             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 20, iFaceX, iFaceY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04960       }
04961 
04962       //loop through the mercs to be displayed
04963       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ( iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel <= NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE ? NUMBER_OF_MERC_COLUMNS_FOR_TWO_WIDE_MODE : iNumberOfMercsOnUpdatePanel ); iCounter++ )
04964       {
04965             //
04966             // blt the face and name
04967             //
04968 
04969             // get the face x and y
04970             iFaceX = iX + ( iCounter % iNumberWide ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH;  
04971             iFaceY = iY + ( iCounter / iNumberWide ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT +  REASON_FOR_SOLDIER_UPDATE_OFFSET_Y;
04972 
04973             // now get the face
04974             if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] )
04975             {
04976                   iFaceX += TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_OFFSET;
04977                   iFaceY += TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_Y_OFFSET;
04978 
04979                   // there is a face
04980                   RenderSoldierSmallFaceForUpdatePanel( iCounter, iFaceX, iFaceY );
04981                   
04982                   // display the mercs name
04983                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ]->name );
04984                   DrawTextToScreen( sString, (UINT16)(iFaceX-5), (UINT16)(iFaceY + 31), 57, TINYFONT1, FONT_LTRED, FONT_BLACK, 0, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
04985             }
04986       }
04987 
04988       // the button container box
04989       if( fFourWideMode ) 
04990       {
04991             //def: 3/1/99 WAS SUBINDEX 6, 
04992             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 19, iX - 4 + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH,  iY + iNumberHigh * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT + REASON_FOR_SOLDIER_UPDATE_OFFSET_Y+3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
04993       
04994             // ATE: Display string for time compression
04995             DisplayWrappedString( ( UINT16 )( iX ),  ( UINT16 )( iY + iNumberHigh * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT + 5 + REASON_FOR_SOLDIER_UPDATE_OFFSET_Y + 3), ( UINT16 )( iUpdatePanelWidth ), 0, MAP_SCREEN_FONT, FONT_WHITE, gzLateLocalizedString[49], FONT_BLACK, 0, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
04996       }
04997       else
04998       {
04999             //def: 3/1/99 WAS SUBINDEX 6, 
05000             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 19, iX - 4 , iY + iNumberHigh * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT + REASON_FOR_SOLDIER_UPDATE_OFFSET_Y+3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
05001 
05002             // ATE: Display string for time compression
05003             DisplayWrappedString( ( UINT16 )( iX ),  ( UINT16 )( iY + iNumberHigh * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT + 5 + REASON_FOR_SOLDIER_UPDATE_OFFSET_Y+3 ), ( UINT16 )( iUpdatePanelWidth ), 0, MAP_SCREEN_FONT, FONT_WHITE, gzLateLocalizedString[49], FONT_BLACK, 0, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
05004       }
05005 
05006       iCounter = 0;
05007 
05008       // now wrap the border
05009       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberHigh ; iCounter++ )
05010       {
05011             // the sides
05012             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 3, iX - 4, iY + ( iCounter ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
05013             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 5, iX + iUpdatePanelWidth, iY + ( iCounter ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
05014       }
05015 
05016       //big horizontal line
05017       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberWide; iCounter++ )
05018       {
05019             // the top bottom
05020             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 1, iX + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH * (iCounter ) , iY - 4 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
05021             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 1, iX + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH * (iCounter ) , iY + iUpdatePanelHeight - 3 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
05022       }
05023 
05024 
05025       // WANNE 2
05026       //Display the reason for the update box
05027       if( fFourWideMode ) 
05028       {
05029             DisplayWrappedString( ( INT16 )( iX ),  ( INT16 )( iY + 6 ), (INT16)iUpdatePanelWidth, 0, MAP_SCREEN_FONT, FONT_WHITE, pUpdateMercStrings[ iReasonForSoldierUpDate ], FONT_BLACK, 0, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
05030       }
05031       else
05032       {
05033             DisplayWrappedString( ( INT16 )( iX ),  ( INT16 )( iY + 3 ), (INT16)iUpdatePanelWidth, 0, MAP_SCREEN_FONT, FONT_WHITE, pUpdateMercStrings[ iReasonForSoldierUpDate ], FONT_BLACK, 0, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
05034       }
05035 
05036 
05037       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
05038 
05039       // restore extern background rect
05040       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( ( INT16 )( iX - 5 ), ( INT16 )( iY - 5 ), ( INT16 )(  iUpdatePanelWidth + 10 ), ( INT16 )(iUpdatePanelHeight + 6 ) );
05041       
05042       CreateDestroyUpdatePanelButtons( iX, ( iY + iUpdatePanelHeight - 18 ), fFourWideMode );
05043       MarkAButtonDirty( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ] );
05044       MarkAButtonDirty( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ] );
05045       return;
05046 }
05047 
05048 
05049 // WANNE 2
05050 void CreateDestroyUpdatePanelButtons(INT32 iX, INT32 iY, BOOLEAN fFourWideMode )
05051 {
05052       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
05053 
05054       if( ( fShowUpdateBox == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
05055       {
05056             // set to created
05057             fCreated = TRUE;
05058 
05059             fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05060             fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
05061 
05062 //          guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 0 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\group_confirm.sti" ,-1,7,-1,8,-1 );
05063 //          guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 1 ] = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\group_confirm.sti" ,-1,7,-1,8,-1 );
05064             guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 0 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\group_confirm_tactical.sti" ,-1,7,-1,8,-1 );
05065             guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 1 ] = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\group_confirm_tactical.sti" ,-1,7,-1,8,-1 );
05066 
05067             if( fFourWideMode ) 
05068             {
05069                   guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 0 ], ( INT16 )( iX - 4 + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH + 4), (INT16)iY,
05070                                                                   BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
05071                                                                   (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)ContinueUpdateButtonCallback );
05072 
05073                   guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 1 ], ( INT16 ) ( iX - 4 + 2 * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH + 4 ), (INT16)iY,
05074                                                                   BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
05075                                                                   (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)StopUpdateButtonCallback);
05076             }
05077             else
05078             {
05079                   guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 0 ], ( INT16 )( iX), (INT16)iY,
05080                                                                   BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST -1,
05081                                                                   (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)ContinueUpdateButtonCallback);
05082 
05083                   guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 1 ], ( INT16 )( iX + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH ), (INT16)iY,
05084                                                                   BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
05085                                                                   (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)StopUpdateButtonCallback);
05086 
05087             }
05088 
05089             SpecifyButtonText( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ], pUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ] );
05090             SpecifyButtonFont( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ], MAP_SCREEN_FONT );
05091             SpecifyButtonUpTextColors( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
05092             SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
05093             SetButtonFastHelpText( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ], gzLateLocalizedString[51] );
05094 
05095             SpecifyButtonText( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ], pUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ] );
05096             SpecifyButtonFont( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ], MAP_SCREEN_FONT );
05097             SpecifyButtonUpTextColors( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
05098             SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
05099             SetButtonFastHelpText( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ], gzLateLocalizedString[52] );
05100       }
05101       else if( ( fShowUpdateBox == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
05102       {
05103             // set to uncreated
05104             fCreated = FALSE;
05105 
05106             // get rid of the buttons and images
05107             RemoveButton( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 0 ] );
05108             RemoveButton( guiUpdatePanelButtons[ 1 ] );
05109 
05110             UnloadButtonImage( guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 0 ]);
05111             UnloadButtonImage( guiUpdatePanelButtonsImage[ 1 ]);
05112             
05113             // unpause
05114             UnPauseDialogueQueue( );
05115       }
05116 }

05139

05154

05162  ResizeBoxToText( ghUpdateBox );
05163 
05164  // create screen mask
05165  CreateScreenMaskForMoveBox( );
05166 
05167  ShowBox( ghUpdateBox );

05169       return;

05171 
05172 
05173 void CreateUpdateBoxStrings( void )
05174 {
05175       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05176       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
05177       INT32 hStringHandle;
05178 
05179       swprintf( sString, L"%s", pUpdateMercStrings[ iReasonForSoldierUpDate ] );
05180       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
05181 
05182       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SIZE_OF_UPDATE_BOX; iCounter++ )
05183       {
05184             // find valid soldier, add name
05185             if( pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ] )
05186             {
05187                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pUpdateSoldierBox[ iCounter ]->name );
05188                   AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
05189             }
05190       }
05191       
05192       // add a few blank lines
05193       sString[ 0 ] = 0;
05194 
05195       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
05196       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
05197       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
05198       AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
05199 }

05232 
05233 
05234 void CreateDestroyTheUpdateBox( void )
05235 {
05236       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
05237 
05238       if( ( fCreated == FALSE ) && ( fShowUpdateBox == TRUE ) )
05239       {
05240 
05241             if( GetNumberOfMercsInUpdateList( ) == 0 )
05242             {
05243                   fShowUpdateBox = FALSE;
05244                   return;
05245             }
05246 
05247             fCreated = TRUE;
05248 
05249             //InterruptTime();
05250             // create screen mask
05251             CreateScreenMaskForMoveBox( );
05252 
05253             // lock it paused
05254             PauseGame( /*TRUE*/ ); // doesn't take parameters (jonathanl)
05255             LockPauseState( 5 );
05256 
05257             // display the box
05258             DisplaySoldierUpdateBox( );
05259             
05260             // Do beep
05261             PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Sounds\\newbeep.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN );
05262       }
05263       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fShowUpdateBox == FALSE ) )
05264       {
05265             fCreated = FALSE;
05266 
05267             UnLockPauseState( );
05268             UnPauseGame( /*FALSE*/ ); // doesn't take parameters (jonathanl)
05269 
05270             // dirty screen
05271             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05272             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05273             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05274 
05275             // remove screen mask
05276             RemoveScreenMaskForMoveBox( );
05277 
05278             ResetSoldierUpdateBox( );
05279 
05280             CreateDestroyUpdatePanelButtons( 0, 0, FALSE );
05281       }
05282 }

05306 
05307 void RenderSoldierSmallFaceForUpdatePanel( INT32 iIndex, INT32 iX, INT32 iY )
05308 {
05309       INT32 iStartY = 0;
05310       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05311 
05312       // fill the background for the info bars black
05313       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+36, iY+2, iX+44,     iY+30, 0 );
05314       
05315       // put down the background
05316       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, giMercPanelImage, 0, iX, iY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
05317       
05318       // grab the face
05319       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER , giUpdateSoldierFaces[ iIndex ], 0, iX+2, iY+2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
05320       
05321       //HEALTH BAR
05322       pSoldier = pUpdateSoldierBox[ iIndex ];
05323 
05324       // is the merc alive?
05325       if( !pSoldier->bLife )
05326             return;
05327 
05328 
05329       //yellow one for bleeding
05330       iStartY = iY + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bLifeMax/100;
05331       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+36, iStartY, iX+37, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 107, 57 ) ) );
05332       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+37, iStartY, iX+38, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 181, 115 ) ) );
05333       
05334       //pink one for bandaged.
05335       iStartY += 27*pSoldier->bBleeding/100;
05336       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+36, iStartY, iX+37, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 156, 57, 57 ) ) );
05337       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+37, iStartY, iX+38, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 132, 132 ) ) );
05338       
05339       //red one for actual health
05340       iStartY = iY + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bLife/100;
05341       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+36, iStartY, iX+37, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 8, 8 ) ) );
05342       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+37, iStartY, iX+38, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 206, 0, 0 ) ) );
05343       
05344       //BREATH BAR
05345       iStartY = iY + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bBreathMax/100;
05346       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+39, iStartY, iX+40, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 132 ) ) );
05347       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+40, iStartY, iX+41, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 107 ) ) );
05348       
05349       //MORALE BAR
05350       iStartY = iY + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bMorale/100;
05351       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+42, iStartY, iX+43, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 156, 8 ) ) );
05352       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, iX+43, iStartY, iX+44, iY+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 107, 8 ) ) );
05353 
05354 
05355       return;
05356 }
05357 
05358 void ContinueUpdateButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
05359 {
05360       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05361       {
05362         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
05363       }
05364       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
05365   {
05366     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
05367             {
05368       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
05369 
05370                   EndUpdateBox( TRUE );   // restart time compression
05371             }
05372       }
05373 
05374       return;
05375 }
05376 
05377 
05378 void StopUpdateButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
05379 {
05380       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05381       {
05382         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
05383       }
05384       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
05385   {
05386     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
05387             {
05388       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
05389 
05390                   EndUpdateBox( FALSE );  // stop time compression
05391             }
05392       }
05393 
05394       return;
05395 }
05396 
05397 
05398 
05399 void EndUpdateBox( BOOLEAN fContinueTimeCompression )
05400 {
05401       fShowUpdateBox = FALSE;
05402 
05403       CreateDestroyTheUpdateBox();
05404 
05405       if ( fContinueTimeCompression )
05406       {
05407             StartTimeCompression();
05408       }
05409       else
05410       {
05411             StopTimeCompression();
05412       }
05413 }

05457 
05458 void UpdateHelpTextForMapScreenMercIcons( void )
05459 {
05460       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 ) || ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == FALSE ) )
05461       {
05462             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gContractIconRegion), L"" );
05463             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gInsuranceIconRegion), L"" );
05464             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gDepositIconRegion), L"" );
05465       }
05466       else
05467       {
05468             // if merc is an AIM merc
05469             if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
05470             {
05471                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gContractIconRegion), zMarksMapScreenText[ 22 ] );
05472             }
05473             else
05474             {
05475                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gContractIconRegion), L"" );
05476             }
05477 
05478             // if merc has life insurance
05479             if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].usLifeInsurance > 0 )
05480             {
05481                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gInsuranceIconRegion), zMarksMapScreenText[ 3 ] );
05482             }
05483             else
05484             {
05485                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gInsuranceIconRegion), L"" );
05486             }
05487 
05488             // if merc has a medical deposit
05489             if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].usMedicalDeposit > 0 )
05490             {
05491                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gDepositIconRegion), zMarksMapScreenText[ 12 ] );
05492             }
05493             else
05494             {
05495                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gDepositIconRegion), L"" );
05496             }
05497       }
05498 }
05499 
05500 void CreateDestroyInsuranceMouseRegionForMercs( BOOLEAN fCreate )
05501 {
05502       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
05503 
05504       if( ( fCreated == FALSE ) && ( fCreate == TRUE ) )
05505       {
05506             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gContractIconRegion, CHAR_ICON_X, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y, CHAR_ICON_X + CHAR_ICON_WIDTH, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + CHAR_ICON_HEIGHT,
05507                                      MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
05508 
05509             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gInsuranceIconRegion, CHAR_ICON_X, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + CHAR_ICON_SPACING, CHAR_ICON_X + CHAR_ICON_WIDTH, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + CHAR_ICON_SPACING + CHAR_ICON_HEIGHT,
05510                                      MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
05511 
05512             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gDepositIconRegion, CHAR_ICON_X, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + ( 2 * CHAR_ICON_SPACING ), CHAR_ICON_X + CHAR_ICON_WIDTH, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + ( 2 * CHAR_ICON_SPACING ) + CHAR_ICON_HEIGHT,
05513                                      MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
05514 
05515             fCreated = TRUE;
05516       }
05517       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fCreate == FALSE ) )
05518       {
05519             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gContractIconRegion );
05520             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gInsuranceIconRegion );
05521             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDepositIconRegion );
05522             fCreated = FALSE;
05523       }

05575 
05576 
05577 BOOLEAN HandleTimeCompressWithTeamJackedInAndGearedToGo( void )
05578 {
05579       // check a team is ready to go
05580       if( !( AnyMercsHired( ) ) )
05581       {
05582             // no mercs, leave
05583             return( FALSE );
05584       }
05585 
05586       // make sure the game just started
05587       if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart == FALSE )
05588       {
05589             return( FALSE );
05590       }
05591 
05592       // select starting sector (A9 - Omerta)
05593       ChangeSelectedMapSector( 9, 1, 0 );
05594 
05595       // load starting sector
05596       if ( !SetCurrentWorldSector( 9, 1, 0 ) )
05597       {
05598             return( FALSE );
05599       }
05600       
05601       //Setup variables in the PBI for this first battle.  We need to support the
05602       //non-persistant PBI in case the user goes to mapscreen.
05603       gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = TRUE;
05604       gubPBSectorX = 9;
05605       gubPBSectorY = 1;
05606       gubPBSectorZ = 0;
05607       gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
05608       
05609       InitHelicopterEntranceByMercs( );
05610 
05611       FadeInGameScreen( );
05612 
05613       SetUpShutDownMapScreenHelpTextScreenMask( );
05614 
05615       // Add e-mail message
05616       AddEmail(ENRICO_CONGRATS,ENRICO_CONGRATS_LENGTH,MAIL_ENRICO, GetWorldTotalMin() );
05617 
05618 
05619       return( TRUE );
05620 }
05621 
05622 void HandleDisplayOfExitToTacticalMessageForFirstEntryToMapScreen( void )
05623 {
05624       INT32 iTime = 0, iDifference = 0;
05625 
05626       if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart == FALSE )
05627       {
05628             return;
05629       }
05630 
05631       if( AnyMercsHired() == FALSE )
05632       {
05633             return;
05634       }
05635 
05636       if( fResetTimerForFirstEntryIntoMapScreen )
05637       {
05638             giExitToTactBaseTime = 0;
05639             fResetTimerForFirstEntryIntoMapScreen = FALSE;
05640       }
05641 
05642       // is this the first time in?
05643       if( giExitToTactBaseTime == 0 )
05644       {
05645             // gte the clock, for initing
05646             giExitToTactBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
05647       }
05648 
05649       iTime = GetJA2Clock();
05650 
05651       iDifference = iTime - giExitToTactBaseTime;
05652       
05653       if( iDifference > TIMER_FOR_SHOW_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL_MESSAGE )
05654       {
05655             fShowMapScreenHelpText = FALSE;
05656             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05657             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05658             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05659             giExitToTactBaseTime = 0;
05660       }
05661 
05662       
05663       return;
05664 }
05665 
05666 
05667 BOOLEAN NotifyPlayerWhenEnemyTakesControlOfImportantSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ, BOOLEAN fContested )
05668 {
05669       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ], sStringA[ 64 ], sStringB[ 256 ], sStringC[ 64 ];
05670       INT32 iValue = 0;
05671       INT8 bTownId = 0;
05672       INT16 sSector = 0;
05673       INT8 bMineIndex;
05674 
05675 
05676       // are we below ground?
05677       if( bSectorZ != 0 )
05678       {
05679             // yes we are..there is nothing important to player here
05680             return( FALSE );
05681       }
05682 
05683       // get the name of the sector
05684       GetSectorIDString( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, sString, TRUE );
05685 
05686       bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY );
05687 
05688       // check if SAM site here
05689       if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ ) )
05690       {
05691             swprintf( sStringB, pMapErrorString[ 15 ], sString );
05692 
05693             // put up the message informing the player of the event 
05694             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sStringB, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
05695             return( TRUE );
05696       }
05697 
05698 
05699       // check if a mine is here
05700       if( IsThereAMineInThisSector( sSectorX, sSectorY ) )
05701       {
05702             bMineIndex = GetMineIndexForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY );
05703 
05704             // if it was producing for us
05705             if ( ( GetMaxDailyRemovalFromMine( bMineIndex ) > 0 ) && SpokenToHeadMiner( bMineIndex ) )
05706             {
05707                   // get how much we now will get from the mines
05708                   iValue = GetProjectedTotalDailyIncome( );
05709                   
05710                   // parse the string
05711                   swprintf( sStringC, L"%d", iValue );
05712                   
05713                   // insert 
05714                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sStringC );
05715                   InsertDollarSignInToString( sStringC );
05716 
05717                   swprintf( sStringB, pMapErrorString[ 16 ], sString, sStringC );
05718 
05719                   // put up the message informing the player of the event 
05720                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sStringB, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
05721                   return( TRUE );
05722             }
05723       }
05724 
05725 
05726       if( fContested && bTownId )
05727       {
05728             if( bTownId == SAN_MONA )
05729             { //San Mona isn't important.
05730                   return( TRUE );
05731             }
05732             swprintf( sStringB, pMapErrorString[ 25 ], sString );
05733 
05734             // put up the message informing the player of the event 
05735             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sStringB, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
05736             return( TRUE );
05737       }
05738       
05739       // get the strategic sector value
05740       sSector = sSectorX + MAP_WORLD_X * sSectorY;
05741 
05742       if( StrategicMap[ sSector ].bNameId == BLANK_SECTOR )
05743       {
05744             return( FALSE );
05745       }
05746 
05747       // get the name of the sector
05748       GetSectorIDString( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, sStringA, TRUE );
05749 
05750       // now build the string
05751       swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 17 ], sStringA );
05752 
05753       // put up the message box
05754       DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
05755 
05756       return( TRUE );
05757 }
05758 
05759 
05760 void NotifyPlayerOfInvasionByEnemyForces( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
05761 {
05762       INT16 sSector = 0;
05763       INT8 bTownId = 0;
05764       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ], sStringA[ 128 ];
05765 
05766 
05767       // check if below ground
05768       if( bSectorZ != 0 )
05769       {
05770             return;
05771       }
05772 
05773       // grab sector value
05774       sSector = sSectorX + MAP_WORLD_X * sSectorY;
05775 
05776       if( StrategicMap[ sSector ].fEnemyControlled == TRUE )
05777       {
05778             // enemy controlled any ways, leave
05779             return;
05780       }
05781 
05782       // get the town id
05783       bTownId = StrategicMap[ sSector ].bNameId;
05784 
05785       // check if SAM site here
05786       if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ ) )
05787       {
05788             // get sector id value
05789             GetShortSectorString( sSectorX, sSectorY, sStringA );
05790 
05791             swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 22 ], sStringA );
05792             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, ReturnCallback );
05793       }
05794       else if( bTownId )
05795       {
05796             // get the name of the sector
05797             GetSectorIDString( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, sStringA, TRUE );
05798 
05799             swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 23 ], sStringA );
05800             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, ReturnCallback );
05801       }
05802       else
05803       {
05804             // get sector id value
05805             GetShortSectorString( sSectorX, sSectorY, sStringA );
05806 
05807             swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 24 ], sStringA );
05808             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, sString );
05809       }
05810 }
05811 
05812 
05813 BOOLEAN CanCharacterMoveInStrategic( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 *pbErrorNumber )
05814 {
05815       BOOLEAN fCanMove = TRUE;
05816       INT16 sSector = 0;
05817       BOOLEAN fProblemExists = FALSE;
05818 
05819 
05820       // valid soldier?
05821       Assert( pSoldier );
05822       Assert( pSoldier->bActive);
05823 
05824 
05825       // NOTE: Check for the most permanent conditions first, and the most easily remedied ones last!
05826       // In case several cases apply, only the reason found first will be given, so make it a good one!
05827 
05828 
05829       // still in transit?
05830       if( IsCharacterInTransit( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
05831       {
05832             *pbErrorNumber = 8;
05833             return( FALSE );
05834       }
05835 
05836       // a POW?
05837       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
05838       {
05839             *pbErrorNumber = 5;
05840             return( FALSE );
05841       }
05842 
05843 
05844       // underground? (can't move strategically, must use tactical traversal )
05845       if( pSoldier->bSectorZ != 0 )
05846       {
05847             *pbErrorNumber = 1;
05848             return( FALSE );
05849       }
05850 
05851 
05852       // vehicle checks
05853       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05854       {
05855             // empty (needs a driver!)?
05856             if ( GetNumberInVehicle( pSoldier->bVehicleID ) == 0 )
05857             {
05858                   *pbErrorNumber = 32;
05859                   return( FALSE );
05860             }
05861 
05862             // too damaged?
05863             if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
05864             {
05865                   *pbErrorNumber = 47;
05866                   return( FALSE );
05867             }
05868 
05869             // out of fuel?
05870             if ( !VehicleHasFuel( pSoldier ) )
05871             {
05872                   *pbErrorNumber = 42;
05873                   return( FALSE );
05874             }
05875       }
05876       else  // non-vehicle
05877       {
05878             // dead?
05879             if ( pSoldier->bLife <= 0 )
05880             {
05881                   swprintf( gsCustomErrorString, pMapErrorString[ 35 ], pSoldier->name );
05882                   *pbErrorNumber = -99;   // customized error message!
05883                   return( FALSE );
05884             }
05885 
05886             // too injured?
05887             if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
05888             {
05889                   swprintf( gsCustomErrorString, pMapErrorString[ 33 ], pSoldier->name );
05890                   *pbErrorNumber = -99;   // customized error message!
05891                   return( FALSE );
05892             }
05893       }
05894 
05895 
05896       // if merc is in a particular sector, not somewhere in between
05897       if ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors == FALSE )
05898       {
05899             // and he's NOT flying above it all in a working helicopter
05900             if( !SoldierAboardAirborneHeli( pSoldier ) )
05901             {
05902                   // and that sector is loaded...
05903                   if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY ) &&
05904                               ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) )
05905                   {
05906                         // in combat?
05907                         if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
05908                         {
05909                               *pbErrorNumber = 11;
05910                               return( FALSE );
05911                         }
05912 
05913                         // hostile sector?
05914                         if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
05915                         { 
05916                               *pbErrorNumber = 2;
05917                               return( FALSE );
05918                         }
05919 
05920                         // air raid in loaded sector where character is?
05921                         if( InAirRaid( ) )
05922                         {
05923                               *pbErrorNumber = 10;
05924                               return( FALSE );
05925                         }
05926                   }
05927 
05928                   // not necessarily loaded - if there are any hostiles there
05929                   if( NumHostilesInSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) > 0 )
05930                   {
05931                         *pbErrorNumber = 2;
05932                         return( FALSE );
05933                   }
05934             }
05935       }
05936 
05937 
05938       // if in L12 museum, and the museum alarm went off, and Eldin still around?
05939       if ( ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 12 ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_L ) && ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 ) &&
05940                    ( !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors ) && gMercProfiles[ ELDIN ].bMercStatus != MERC_IS_DEAD )
05941       {
05942             UINT8 ubRoom, cnt;
05943             SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier2;
05944 
05945             if ( InARoom( pSoldier->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && ubRoom >= 22 && ubRoom <= 41 )
05946             {
05947 
05948                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05949 
05950                   for ( pSoldier2 = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier2++)
05951                   {
05952                         if ( pSoldier2->bActive )
05953                         {
05954                               if ( FindObj( pSoldier2, CHALICE ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
05955                               {
05956                                     *pbErrorNumber = 34;
05957                                     return( FALSE );
05958                               }
05959                         }
05960                   }
05961             }
05962       }
05963 
05964 
05965       // on assignment, other than just in a VEHICLE?
05966       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
05967       {
05968             *pbErrorNumber = 3;
05969             return( FALSE );
05970       }
05971 
05972       // if he's walking/driving, and so tired that he would just stop the group anyway in the next sector,
05973       // or already asleep and can't be awakened
05974       if ( PlayerSoldierTooTiredToTravel( pSoldier ) )
05975       {
05976             // too tired
05977             swprintf( gsCustomErrorString, pMapErrorString[ 43 ], pSoldier->name );
05978             *pbErrorNumber = -99;   // customized error message!
05979             return( FALSE );
05980       }
05981 
05982 
05983       // a robot?
05984       if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
05985       {
05986             // going alone?
05987             if ( ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( !IsRobotControllerInVehicle( pSoldier->iVehicleId ) ) ) ||
05988                          ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment  < ON_DUTY ) && ( !IsRobotControllerInSquad( pSoldier->bAssignment ) ) ) )
05989             {
05990                   *pbErrorNumber = 49;
05991                   return( FALSE );
05992             }
05993       }
05994       // an Escorted NPC?
05995       else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
05996       {
05997             // going alone?
05998             if ( ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( GetNumberOfNonEPCsInVehicle( pSoldier->iVehicleId ) == 0 ) ) ||
05999                          ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment  < ON_DUTY ) && ( NumberOfNonEPCsInSquad( pSoldier->bAssignment ) == 0 ) ) )
06000             {
06001                   // are they male or female
06002                   if( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bSex == MALE )
06003                   {
06004                         swprintf( gsCustomErrorString, L"%s %s", pSoldier->name ,pMapErrorString[ 6 ] );
06005                   }
06006                   else
06007                   {
06008                         swprintf( gsCustomErrorString, L"%s %s", pSoldier->name ,pMapErrorString[ 7 ] );
06009                   }
06010 
06011                   *pbErrorNumber = -99;   // customized error message!
06012                   return( FALSE );
06013             }
06014       }
06015 
06016 
06017       // assume there's no problem
06018       fProblemExists = FALSE;
06019 
06020       // find out if this particular character can't move for some reason
06021       switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
06022       {
06023             case( MARIA ):
06024                   // Maria can't move if she's in sector C5
06025                   sSector = SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY );
06026                   if( sSector == SEC_C5 )
06027                   {
06028                         // can't move at this time
06029                         fProblemExists = TRUE;
06030                   }
06031                   break;
06032       }
06033 
06034       if ( fProblemExists )
06035       {
06036             // inform user this specific merc cannot be moved out of the sector
06037             swprintf( gsCustomErrorString, pMapErrorString[ 29 ], pSoldier->name );
06038             *pbErrorNumber = -99;   // customized error message!
06039             return( FALSE );
06040       }
06041 
06042 
06043       // passed all checks - this character may move strategically!
06044       return( TRUE );
06045 }
06046 
06047 
06048 BOOLEAN CanEntireMovementGroupMercIsInMove( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 *pbErrorNumber )
06049 {
06050       SOLDIERTYPE *pCurrentSoldier = NULL;
06051       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06052       UINT8 ubGroup = 0;
06053       UINT8 ubCurrentGroup = 0;
06054 
06055 
06056       // first check the requested character himself
06057       if( CanCharacterMoveInStrategic( pSoldier, pbErrorNumber ) == FALSE )
06058       {
06059             // failed no point checking anyone else
06060             return( FALSE );
06061       }
06062 
06063 
06064       // now check anybody who would be travelling with him
06065 
06066       // does character have group?
06067       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
06068       {
06069             // IS a vehicle - use vehicle's group
06070             ubGroup = pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].ubMovementGroup;
06071       }
06072       else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
06073       {
06074             // IN a vehicle - use vehicle's group
06075             ubGroup = pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
06076       }
06077       else
06078       {
06079             ubGroup = pSoldier->ubGroupID;
06080       }
06081 
06082       // even if group is 0 (not that that should happen, should it?) still loop through for other mercs selected to move
06083 
06084       // if anyone in the merc's group or also selected cannot move for whatever reason return false
06085       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
06086       {
06087             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
06088             {
06089                   // get soldier
06090                   pCurrentSoldier = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
06091 
06092                   // skip inactive grunts
06093                   if( pCurrentSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
06094                   {
06095                         continue;
06096                   }
06097 
06098                   // skip the same guy we did already
06099                   if ( pCurrentSoldier == pSoldier )
06100                   {
06101                         continue;
06102                   }
06103 
06104                   // does character have group?
06105                   if( pCurrentSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
06106                   {
06107                         // IS a vehicle
06108                         ubCurrentGroup = pVehicleList[ pCurrentSoldier->bVehicleID ].ubMovementGroup;
06109                   }
06110                   else if( pCurrentSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
06111                   {
06112                         // IN a vehicle
06113                         ubCurrentGroup = pVehicleList[ pCurrentSoldier->iVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
06114                   }
06115                   else
06116                   {
06117                         ubCurrentGroup = pCurrentSoldier->ubGroupID;
06118                   }
06119 
06120                   // if he is in the same movement group (i.e. squad), or he is still selected to go with us (legal?)
06121                   if( ( ubCurrentGroup == ubGroup ) || ( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE ) )
06122                   {
06123                         // can this character also move strategically?
06124                         if( CanCharacterMoveInStrategic( pCurrentSoldier, pbErrorNumber ) == FALSE )
06125                         {
06126                               // cannot move, fail, and don't bother checking anyone else, either
06127                               return( FALSE );
06128                         }
06129                   }
06130             }
06131       }
06132 
06133 
06134       // everybody can move...  Yey!  :-)
06135       return( TRUE );
06136 }
06137

06139 
06140 void ReportMapScreenMovementError( INT8 bErrorNumber )
06141 {
06142       if ( bErrorNumber == -99 )
06143       {
06144             // - 99 is a special message # indicating a customized message
06145             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gsCustomErrorString, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
06146       }
06147       else
06148       {
06149             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapErrorString[ bErrorNumber ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
06150       }
06151 }

06155 void HandleRebuildingOfMapScreenCharacterList( void )
06156 {
06157       // check if we need to rebuild the list?
06158       if( fReBuildCharacterList )
06159       {
06160             // do the actual rebuilding
06161             ReBuildCharactersList( );
06162 
06163             // reset the flag
06164             fReBuildCharacterList = FALSE;
06165       }
06166 }

06169 void RequestToggleTimeCompression( void )
06170 {
06171       if( !IsTimeBeingCompressed( ) )
06172       {
06173             StartTimeCompression();
06174       }
06175       else  // currently compressing
06176       {
06177             StopTimeCompression();
06178       }
06179 }

06182 void RequestIncreaseInTimeCompression( void )
06183 {
06184       if ( IsTimeBeingCompressed( ) )
06185       {
06186             IncreaseGameTimeCompressionRate();
06187       }
06188       else
06189       {
06190 /*
06191             // start compressing
06192             StartTimeCompression();
06193 */
06194             // ARM Change: start over at 5x compression
06195             SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_5MINS );
06196       }
06197 }

06200 
06201 void RequestDecreaseInTimeCompression( void )
06202 {
06203       if ( IsTimeBeingCompressed( ) )
06204       {
06205             DecreaseGameTimeCompressionRate();
06206       }
06207       else
06208       {
06209             // check that we can
06210             if ( !AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
06211             {
06212                   // not allowed to compress time
06213                   TellPlayerWhyHeCantCompressTime();
06214                   return;
06215             }
06216 
06217             // ARM Change: do nothing
06218 /*
06219             // if compression mode is set, just restart time so player can see it
06220             if ( giTimeCompressMode > TIME_COMPRESS_X1 )
06221             {
06222                   StartTimeCompression();
06223             }
06224 */
06225       }
06226 }

06228 
06229 
06230 BOOLEAN CanSoldierMoveWithVehicleId( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iVehicle1Id )
06231 {
06232       INT32 iVehicle2Id = -1;
06233       VEHICLETYPE *pVehicle1, *pVehicle2;
06234 
06235 
06236       Assert( iVehicle1Id != -1 );
06237 
06238       // if soldier is IN a vehicle
06239       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
06240       {
06241             iVehicle2Id = pSoldier->iVehicleId;
06242       }
06243       else
06244       // if soldier IS a vehicle
06245       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
06246       {
06247             iVehicle2Id = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
06248       }
06249 
06250 
06251       // if also (in) a vehicle
06252       if ( iVehicle2Id != -1 )
06253       {
06254             // if it's the same vehicle
06255             if ( iVehicle1Id == iVehicle2Id )
06256             {
06257                   return( TRUE );
06258             }
06259 
06260             // helicopter can't move together with ground vehicles!
06261             if ( ( iVehicle1Id == iHelicopterVehicleId ) || ( iVehicle2Id == iHelicopterVehicleId ) )
06262             {
06263                   return( FALSE );
06264             }
06265 
06266             pVehicle1 = &( pVehicleList[ iVehicle1Id ] );
06267             pVehicle2 = &( pVehicleList[ iVehicle2Id ] );
06268 
06269             // as long as they're in the same location, amd neither is between sectors, different vehicles is also ok
06270             if( ( pVehicle1->sSectorX == pVehicle2->sSectorX ) &&
06271                     ( pVehicle1->sSectorY == pVehicle2->sSectorY ) &&
06272                     ( pVehicle1->sSectorZ == pVehicle2->sSectorZ ) &&
06273                               !pVehicle1->fBetweenSectors &&
06274                               !pVehicle2->fBetweenSectors )
06275             {
06276                   return( TRUE );
06277             }
06278       }
06279 
06280 
06281       // not in/is a vehicle, or in a different vehicle that isn't in the same location
06282       return ( FALSE );
06283 }
06284 
06285 
06286 BOOLEAN SaveLeaveItemList( HWFILE hFile )
06287 {
06288       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06289       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pCurrentItem;
06290       UINT32 uiCount=0;
06291       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten = 0;
06292       BOOLEAN     fNodeExists = FALSE;
06293       UINT32      uiCnt;
06294 
06295       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
06296       {
06297             // go through nodes and save them
06298             if ( gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] != NULL )
06299             {
06300                   fNodeExists = TRUE;
06301 
06302                   // Save the to specify that a node DOES exist
06303                   FileWrite( hFile, &fNodeExists, sizeof(BOOLEAN), &uiNumBytesWritten );
06304                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof(BOOLEAN) )
06305                   {
06306                         return(FALSE);
06307                   }
06308 
06309                   uiCount = 1;
06310                   pCurrentItem = gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ];
06311 
06312                   //loop through all the nodes to see how many there are
06313                   while( pCurrentItem->pNext )
06314                   {
06315                          pCurrentItem = pCurrentItem->pNext;
06316                          uiCount++;
06317                   }
06318 
06319                   // Save the number specifing how many items there are in the list
06320                   FileWrite( hFile, &uiCount, sizeof(UINT32), &uiNumBytesWritten );
06321                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof(UINT32) )
06322                   {
06323                         return(FALSE);
06324                   }
06325 
06326                   pCurrentItem = gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ];
06327 
06328                   //loop through all the nodes to see how many there are
06329                   for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<uiCount; uiCnt++)
06330                   {
06331                         // Save the items 
06332                         FileWrite( hFile, pCurrentItem, sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
06333                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) )
06334                         {
06335                               return(FALSE);
06336                         }
06337 
06338                         pCurrentItem = pCurrentItem->pNext;
06339                   }
06340             }
06341             else
06342             {
06343                   fNodeExists = FALSE;
06344                   // Save the to specify that a node DOENST exist
06345                   FileWrite( hFile, &fNodeExists, sizeof(BOOLEAN), &uiNumBytesWritten );
06346                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof(BOOLEAN) )
06347                   {
06348                         return(FALSE);
06349                   }
06350             }
06351       }
06352 
06353       //Save the leave list profile id's
06354       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
06355       {
06356             FileWrite( hFile, &guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ iCounter ], sizeof(UINT32), &uiNumBytesWritten );
06357             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof(UINT32) )
06358             {
06359                   return(FALSE);
06360             }
06361       }
06362 
06363       return( TRUE );
06364 }
06365 
06366 
06367 
06368 BOOLEAN LoadLeaveItemList( HWFILE hFile )
06369 {
06370       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06371       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pCurrentItem;
06372       MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *pItem;
06373       UINT32 uiCount=0;
06374       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead = 0;
06375       BOOLEAN     fNodeExists = FALSE;
06376       UINT32      uiSubItem;
06377 
06378       //Shutdown the list
06379       ShutDownLeaveList( );
06380 
06381       //init the list
06382       InitLeaveList( );
06383 
06384       //loop through all the lists
06385       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
06386       {
06387             // load the flag that specifis that a node DOES exist
06388             FileRead( hFile, &fNodeExists, sizeof(BOOLEAN), &uiNumBytesRead );
06389             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof(BOOLEAN) )
06390             {
06391                   return(FALSE);
06392             }
06393 
06394             // if a root node is supposed to exist
06395             if( fNodeExists )
06396             {
06397                   // load the number specifing how many items there are in the list
06398                   FileRead( hFile, &uiCount, sizeof(UINT32), &uiNumBytesRead );
06399                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof(UINT32) )
06400                   {
06401                         return(FALSE);
06402                   }
06403 
06404                   // allocate space
06405                   gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] = (MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) );
06406                   if( gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] == NULL )
06407                   {
06408                         return( FALSE );
06409                   }
06410                   memset( gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ], 0, sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) );
06411 
06412                   pCurrentItem = gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ];
06413 
06414                   for( uiSubItem=0; uiSubItem< uiCount; uiSubItem++ )
06415                   {
06416                         // allocate space
06417                         pItem = (MERC_LEAVE_ITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) );
06418                         if( pItem == NULL )
06419                         {
06420                               return( FALSE );
06421                         }
06422                         memset( pItem, 0, sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) );
06423 
06424                         // Load the items 
06425                         FileRead( hFile, pItem, sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ), &uiNumBytesRead );
06426                         if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( MERC_LEAVE_ITEM ) )
06427                         {
06428                               return(FALSE);
06429                         }
06430 
06431 
06432                         pItem->pNext = NULL;
06433 
06434                         //add the node to the list
06435                         if( uiSubItem == 0 )
06436                         {
06437                               gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ] = pItem;
06438                               pCurrentItem = gpLeaveListHead[ iCounter ];                             
06439                         }
06440                         else
06441                         {
06442                               pCurrentItem->pNext = pItem;
06443                               pCurrentItem = pCurrentItem->pNext;
06444                         }
06445                   }
06446             }
06447       }
06448 
06449       //Load the leave list profile id's
06450       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_LEAVE_LIST_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
06451       {
06452             FileRead( hFile, &guiLeaveListOwnerProfileId[ iCounter ], sizeof(UINT32), &uiNumBytesRead );
06453             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof(UINT32) )
06454             {
06455                   return(FALSE);
06456             }
06457       }
06458 
06459       return( TRUE );
06460 }
06461 
06462 
06463 
06464 void TurnOnSectorLocator( UINT8 ubProfileID )
06465 {
06466       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06467 
06468       Assert( ubProfileID != NO_PROFILE );
06469 
06470       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, FALSE );
06471       if( pSoldier )
06472       {
06473             gsSectorLocatorX = pSoldier->sSectorX;
06474             gsSectorLocatorY = pSoldier->sSectorY;
06475       }
06476       else
06477       {
06478             // if it's Skyrider (when he's not on our team), and his chopper has been setup
06479             if ( ( ubProfileID == SKYRIDER ) && fSkyRiderSetUp )
06480             {
06481                   // if helicopter position is being shown, don't do this, too, cause the helicopter icon is on top and it looks
06482                   // like crap.  I tried moving the heli icon blit to before, but that screws up it's blitting.
06483                   if ( !fShowAircraftFlag )
06484                   {
06485                         // can't use his profile, he's where his chopper is
06486                         Assert( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 );
06487                         gsSectorLocatorX = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX;
06488                         gsSectorLocatorY = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY;
06489                   }
06490                   else
06491                   {
06492                         return;
06493                   }
06494             }
06495             else
06496             {
06497                   gsSectorLocatorX = gMercProfiles[ ubProfileID ].sSectorX;
06498                   gsSectorLocatorY = gMercProfiles[ ubProfileID ].sSectorY;
06499             }
06500       }
06501       gubBlitSectorLocatorCode = LOCATOR_COLOR_YELLOW;
06502 }
06503 
06504 
06505 void TurnOffSectorLocator()
06506 {
06507       gubBlitSectorLocatorCode = LOCATOR_COLOR_NONE;
06508       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06509 }
06510 
06511 
06512 
06513 void HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ, UINT8 ubLocatorID )
06514 {
06515       static UINT8  ubFrame = 0;
06516       UINT8 ubBaseFrame = 0;
06517       UINT32 uiTimer = 0;
06518       HVOBJECT hHandle;
06519       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
06520 
06521 
06522       // blits at 0,0 had been observerd...
06523       Assert( ( sSectorX >= 1 ) && ( sSectorX <= 16 ) );
06524       Assert( ( sSectorY >= 1 ) && ( sSectorY <= 16 ) );
06525       Assert( ( sSectorZ >= 0 ) && ( sSectorZ <=  3 ) );
06526 
06527       if( sSectorZ != iCurrentMapSectorZ )
06528       { //if the z level of the map screen renderer is different than the 
06529             //sector z that we wish to locate, then don't render it
06530             return;
06531       }
06532 
06533       // if showing sector inventory, don't do this
06534       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
06535       {
06536             return;
06537       }
06538 
06539 
06540       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiSectorLocatorGraphicID );
06541 
06542       switch( ubLocatorID )
06543       {
06544             // grab zoomed out icon
06545             case LOCATOR_COLOR_RED:
06546                   ubBaseFrame = 0;
06547                   ubFrame = (UINT8)(ubFrame % 13);
06548                   break;
06549             case LOCATOR_COLOR_YELLOW:
06550                   ubBaseFrame = 13;
06551                   ubFrame = (UINT8)(13 + (ubFrame % 13) );
06552                   break;
06553             default:
06554                   //not supported
06555                   return;
06556       }
06557 
06558       //Convert the sector value into screen values.
06559       GetScreenXYFromMapXY( sSectorX, sSectorY, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
06560       // make sure we are on the border
06561       if( sScreenX < MAP_GRID_X )
06562       {
06563             sScreenX = MAP_GRID_X;
06564       }
06565       sScreenY--; //Carterism ritual
06566   if( sScreenY < MAP_GRID_Y )
06567       {
06568             sScreenY = MAP_GRID_Y;
06569       }
06570 
06571       uiTimer = GetJA2Clock();
06572 
06573       // if first time in, reset value
06574       if( guiSectorLocatorBaseTime == 0 )
06575       {
06576             guiSectorLocatorBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
06577       }
06578 
06579       // check if enough time has passed to update the frame counter
06580       if( ANIMATED_BATTLEICON_FRAME_TIME < ( uiTimer - guiSectorLocatorBaseTime ) )
06581       {
06582             guiSectorLocatorBaseTime = uiTimer;
06583             ubFrame++;
06584 
06585             if( ubFrame > ubBaseFrame + MAX_FRAME_COUNT_FOR_ANIMATED_BATTLE_ICON )
06586             {
06587                   ubFrame = ubBaseFrame;
06588             }
06589       }
06590 
06591       RestoreExternBackgroundRect(  (INT16)(sScreenX + 1), (INT16)(sScreenY - 1),  MAP_GRID_X , MAP_GRID_Y );
06592 
06593       // blit object to frame buffer
06594       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, ubFrame, sScreenX, sScreenY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
06595 
06596       // invalidate region on frame buffer
06597       InvalidateRegion( sScreenX, sScreenY - 1, sScreenX + MAP_GRID_X , sScreenY + MAP_GRID_Y );
06598 }
06599 
06600 
06601 
06602 BOOLEAN CheckIfSalaryIncreasedAndSayQuote( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fTriggerContractMenu )
06603 {
06604       Assert( pSoldier );
06605 
06606       // OK, check if their price has gone up
06607       if( pSoldier->fContractPriceHasIncreased )
06608       {
06609             if ( fTriggerContractMenu )
06610             {
06611                   // have him say so first - post the dialogue event with the contract menu event
06612                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_ENTER_MAPSCREEN,0,0,0,0,0 );
06613                   HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier, QUOTE_MERC_GONE_UP_IN_PRICE );
06614                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOW_CONTRACT_MENU, 0,0 );
06615             }
06616             else
06617             {
06618                   // now post the dialogue event and the contratc menu event
06619                   HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier, QUOTE_MERC_GONE_UP_IN_PRICE );
06620             }
06621 
06622             pSoldier->fContractPriceHasIncreased = FALSE;
06623 
06624             // said quote / triggered contract menu
06625             return( TRUE );
06626       }
06627       else
06628       {
06629             // nope, nothing to do
06630             return( FALSE );
06631       }
06632 }
